 320+ 8D97 04                                   inc     b
 321+ 8D98 C5                                   push    bc
 322+ 8D99                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 322+ 8D99 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 323+ 8D9D CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 324+ 8DA0 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 325+ 8DA3 C1                                   pop    bc
 326+ 8DA4 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 327+ 8DA6 0D                                   dec     c
 328+ 8DA7                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 328+ 8DA7 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 329+ 8DAB CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 330+ 8DAE C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 331+ 8DAF FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 332+ 8DB1 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0

 334+ 8DB6 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 335+ 8DB7 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 336+ 8DB9 05                                   dec     b
 337+ 8DBA C2 38 8C                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 338+ 8DBD C9                                   ret
 339+ 8DBE              ResetStar:              ;break
 340+ 8DBE                                      ;pop     de
 341+ 8DBE C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0

 343+ 8DC2 90                                   sub     b

 346+ 8DC6 ED 30                                mul
 347+ 8DC8 21 F0 95                             ld      hl,varDust
 348+ 8DCB 19                                   add     hl,de

 350+ 8DCF C3 B6 8D                             jp      NextStarLoop2

 352+ 8DD2 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 353+ 8DD5 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 354+ 8DD8 6F                                   ld      l,a
 355+ 8DD9 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 356+ 8DDB 47                                   ld      b,a
 357+ 8DDC CD 4A A2                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 358+ 8DDF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 359+ 8DE0                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 359+ 8DE0 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 359+ 8DE2 C2 ED 8D    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 360+ 8DE5              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 361+ 8DE5 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 362+ 8DE7 26 00                                ld          h,0
 363+ 8DE9 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 364+ 8DEA C3 F4 8D                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 365+ 8DED              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 366+ 8DED 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 367+ 8DEF 26 00                                ld          h,0
 368+ 8DF1                                      ClearCarryFlag
 368+ 8DF1 B7          >				or a
 369+ 8DF2 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 370+ 8DF4              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 371+ 8DF4 7D                                   ld          a,l
 372+ 8DF5 32 48 96                             ld          (varStarX),a
 373+ 8DF8 C9                                   ret
 374+ 8DF9
 375+ 8DF9 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 376+ 8DFC FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 377+ 8DFF 6F                                   ld          l,a
 378+ 8E00 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 379+ 8E02 47                                   ld          b,a
 380+ 8E03 CD 4A A2                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC

 387+ 8E11 C3 19 8E                             jp          StarStoreYPoint

   1+ 8E1E              JumpIfObjectIsPlanet:   MACRO target

   7+ 8E1E              SetMaxVisibility:       MACRO
   8+ 8E1E ~                                    ld		a,MaxVisibility					; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
   9+ 8E1E ~                                    ld		(LastNormalVisible),a			; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  10+ 8E1E                                      ENDM
  11+ 8E1E
  12+ 8E1E              JumpIfObjectOutsideFov: MACRO target
  13+ 8E1E ~            LL10CheckXInFoV:
  14+ 8E1E ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  15+ 8E1E ~                                    ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  16+ 8E1E ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  17+ 8E1E ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  18+ 8E1E ~                                    bit     7,h
  19+ 8E1E ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  20+ 8E1E ~            LL10CheckYInFoV:
  21+ 8E1E ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  22+ 8E1E ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  23+ 8E1E ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  24+ 8E1E ~                                    bit     7,h
  25+ 8E1E ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  26+ 8E1E                                      ENDM
  27+ 8E1E
  28+ 8E1E              LL10AddGunNode:         MACRO

  33+ 8E1E ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray                ; flag node on node heap                                          ;
  34+ 8E1E ~                                    add     hl,bc                           ; at position UBnkNodeArray[GunNode]

  38+ 8E1E ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ;
  39+ 8E1E                                      ENDM

  43+ 8E1E ~                                    ShiftHLDiv8                             ; z position / 8

  45+ 8E1E ~                                    IfANotZeroGoto target                       ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8

  89+ 8EA1              LL10CloseEnoughToDraw:

  93+ 8EA4 CB 3F            srl     a                               ;
  94+ 8EA6 CB 3F            srl     a                               ;

  97+ 8EAD              ;    Note the use of hop for jump/branch instrunction Rather than hop being calc logic
  98+ 8EAD              ;    The original did a bransh on positive but 3 shift right logicalks means bit 7 can never be set
  99+ 8EAD              ObjectDrawForwards:

  38+ 8F13 3A 2A C0         ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)
  39+ 8F16 E6 F7            and     $F7                             ;  clear bit3
  40+ 8F18 32 2A C0         ld      (UBnkexplDsp),a                 ; set bit3 (to erase later) and plot as Dot display|missiles explosion state
  41+ 8F1B C9               ret                                     ; now it will return to the caller of
  42+ 8F1C
  43+ 8F1C              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  44+ 8F1C                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/DrawLines.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm
   1++8F1C              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++8F1C 00           DrawLinesCounter		db	0
   3++8F1D              ; Initial tests look OK
   4++8F1D              LL155:;
   5++8F1D              ClearLine:                                  ; CLEAR LINEstr visited by EE31 when XX3 heap ready to draw/erase lines in XX19 heap.
   6++8F1D                    ;break                                                                             ; ObjectInFront:
   7++8F1D 3E 65        DrawLines:              ld	a,$65 ; DEBUG
   8++8F1F FD 6F                                ld		iyl,a							; set ixl to colour (assuming we come in here with a = colour to draw)
   9++8F21 3A F0 C2                             ld		a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)			; get number of lines
  10++8F24                                      ReturnIfAIsZero   						; No lines then bail out.
  10++8F24 FE 00       >                 cp     0
  10++8F26 C8          >                 ret    z
  11++8F27 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a			                ; number of lines still to draw
  12++8F29 21 FE C1                             ld		hl,UbnkLineArray
  13++8F2C              ;LL27:                                       ; counter Y, Draw clipped lines in XX19 ship lines heap
  14++8F2C 4E           DrawXX19ClippedLines:   ld      c,(hl)                          ; (XX19),Y c = varX1
  15++8F2D 23                                   inc     hl
  16++8F2E 46                                   ld      b,(hl)                          ; bc = point1 Y,X
  17++8F2F 23                                   inc     hl
  18++8F30              ;;DEBUGTEST        push bc
  19++8F30              ;;DEBUGTEST        push hl
  20++8F30              ;;DEBUGTEST        push de

  24++8F30              ;;DEBUGTEST        pop de
  25++8F30              ;;DEBUGTEST        pop hl
  26++8F30              ;;DEBUGTEST        pop bc
  27++8F30 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)                          ; c = varX1
  28++8F31 23                                   inc     hl
  29++8F32 56                                   ld      d,(hl)                          ; de = point2 Y,X
  30++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       push bc
  31++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       push hl
  32++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       push de
  33++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       push de
  34++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop  bc
  35++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       ld  a,$3F
  36++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       MMUSelectLayer2
  37++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       call    l2_plot_pixel
  38++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop de
  39++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop hl
  40++8F33              ;;DEBUGTEST       pop bc
  41++8F33 23                                   inc     hl
  42++8F34 E5                                   push	hl
  43++8F35 FD E5                                push    iy
  44++8F37 60                                   ld      h,b
  45++8F38 69                                   ld      l,c
  46++8F39                ;  call    l2_draw_any_line                ; call version of LOIN that used BCDE
  47++8F39 FD 7D                                ld		a,iyl							; get colour back before calling line draw
  48++8F3B                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  48++8F3B ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  49++8F3F CD F0 E8                             call    LineHLtoDE
  50++8F42 FD E1                                pop     iy
  51++8F44 E1                                   pop	    hl
  52++8F45 FD 25                                dec     iyh
  53++8F47 20 E3                                jr		nz,DrawXX19ClippedLines

 862  8F4A                  include "./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm"
# file opened: ./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm
   1+ 8F4A              SetLastFaceVisible: MACRO
   2+ 8F4A ~                                ld      a,$FF                       ; last normal is always visible                                                         ;;;
   3+ 8F4A ~                                ld      (UbnkFaceVisArray+15),a     ; XX2+15                                                                                ;;;
   4+ 8F4A                                  ENDM
   5+ 8F4A
   6+ 8F4A 3E FF        SetLastFaceVisCall: ld      a,$FF
   7+ 8F4C 32 AF C0                         ld      (UbnkFaceVisArray+15),a
   8+ 8F4F C9                               ret
   9+ 8F50
  10+ 8F50              CheckIfExplodingCall:
  11+ 8F50              ; DEBUG TODO turn into MACRO later
  12+ 8F50              ; Sets Z flag to true if only some faces are visible
  13+ 8F50              ; Clears Z flag if exploding so all faces should be rendered
  14+ 8F50 3A 2A C0             ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)                 ; INWK+31                                                                               ;;; If bit 5 of exploding state is clear
  15+ 8F53              ;;DEBUG
  16+ 8F53 F6 FF                or      $FF ; force bit 5 set so exploding
  17+ 8F55 32 2A C0             ld      (UBnkexplDsp),a
  18+ 8F58              ;;DEBUG
  19+ 8F58 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; save explDsp into c                                                                   ;;;
  20+ 8F59 E6 20                and     $20                         ; mask bit5 exploding                                                                   ;;;
  21+ 8F5B C9                   ret
  22+ 8F5C
  23+ 8F5C
  24+ 8F5C              DrawForwardsIXL:
  25+ 8F5C              DrawForwards:
  26+ 8F5C              LL17:                                       ; draw Wireframe (including nodes exploding)                                            ;;; LL17 draw Wireframe
  27+ 8F5C              ; Copy the three orientation vectors into XX16
  28+ 8F5C CD 74 CF     LL15:   call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; Copy Ship rotation to XX16                                                                                          ;;; load object position to camera matrix XX16 			::LL91 (ish)
  29+ 8F5F              ;;;;LL21:   call    NormaliseTransMat       ; Normalise XX16
  30+ 8F5F CD 56 D1     LL91lc: call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  31+ 8F62              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;;
  32+ 8F62              LastNormalAlwaysVisible:
  33+ 8F62 CD 4A 8F             call    SetLastFaceVisCall          ; DEBUG TODO revert back to MACRO later                                                                                                          ;;; Set last Normal to visible FF regarless
  34+ 8F65              ; HEre original does LDY 12
  35+ 8F65              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;; (Originally loaded faces count here and stored in B, but will remove to simplify code)
  36+ 8F65              CheckIfExplodingState:
  37+ 8F65 CD 50 8F             call    CheckIfExplodingCall
  38+ 8F68 28 0C                jr      z,CullBackFaces             ; EE29 no, only Some visible                                                            ;;;    Goto EE29 - Only some faces visible
  39+ 8F6A              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;; else
  40+ 8F6A              ItIsExploding:
  41+ 8F6A              MakeAllFacesVisible:                                                                                                                        ;;;    Set all faces in XX0 visible
  42+ 8F6A CD BC CF             call    SetAllFacesVisible          ; code point EE30                                                                      ;;;
  43+ 8F6D 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; X = 0                                                                                 ;;;
  44+ 8F6F                      ldWriteZero LastNormalVisible       ; XX4  \ visibility                                                                     ;;;    XX4 visibility = 0
  44+ 8F6F AF          >               xor      a
  44+ 8F70 32 D3 92    >               ld       (LastNormalVisible),a
  45+ 8F73              LL41:                                       ; visibilities now set in XX2,X Transpose matrix.                                       ;;;
  46+ 8F73 C3 79 8F             jp      TransposeMatrix             ; LL42 \ jump to transpose matrix and onwards                                           ;;;    goto LL42
  47+ 8F76              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;;
  48+ 8F76              CullBackFaces:
  49+ 8F76              EE29Entry:
  50+ 8F76 CD 0C D4             call    CullV2
  51+ 8F79              ;-- All normals' visibilities now set in XX2,X                                                                                      ;;;
  52+ 8F79              TransposeMatrix:
  53+ 8F79              LL42:	                                    ; DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat                                           ;;; ......................................................
  54+ 8F79 CD 23 D0             call    InverseXX16
  55+ 8F7C
  56+ 8F7C
  57+ 8F7C CD BF DA             call    ProcessNodes                ; Loop through and determine visibility based on faces and position
  58+ 8F7F              DrawResults:
  59+ 8F7F CD 91 DB             call    PrepLines                   ; LL72, process lines and clip
  60+ 8F82 CD 1D 8F             call    DrawLines                   ; Need to plot all lines
  61+ 8F85 C9                   ret

 864  8F86                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 8F86
   2+ 8F86 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 8F87 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 8F8B 7D
   4+ 8F8C 86 8F        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 8F8E 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 8F90 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 8F93 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 8F95 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 8F99              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 8F99
  11+ 8F99              memfill_dma:
  12+ 8F99              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 8F99              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 8F99 32 86 8F     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 8F9C              .set_target:
  16+ 8F9C 22 93 8F     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 8F9F              .set_length:
  18+ 8F9F ED 53 8E 8F  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 8FA3              .write_dma:
  20+ 8FA3 21 87 8F     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 8FA6 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 8FA8 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 8FAA ED B3        	otir
  24+ 8FAC C9           	ret
  25+ 8FAD
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 865  8FAD                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 8FAD
   2+ 8FAD 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 8FB1 7D
   3+ 8FB2 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 8FB4 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 8FB6 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 8FB9 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 8FBB 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 8FBF              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 8FBF
  10+ 8FBF              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 8FBF              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 8FBF              .set_target:
  13+ 8FBF 22 B9 8F     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 8FC2              .set_source:
  15+ 8FC2 ED 53 B2 8F  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 8FC6              .set_length:
  17+ 8FC6 ED 43 B4 8F  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 8FCA              .write_dma:
  19+ 8FCA 21 AD 8F     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 8FCD 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 8FCF 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 8FD1 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 8FD3 C9           	ret
  24+ 8FD4
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 172+ 8FD4              KeyCode_Quit         	equ VK_Y
 173+ 8FD4              KeyCode_PlanetData   	equ VK_0
 174+ 8FD4              KeyCode_CursorUp        equ VK_Q
 175+ 8FD4              KeyCode_CursorDown      equ VK_A
 176+ 8FD4
 177+ 8FD4 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40
 178+ 8FFC              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 179+ 8FFC 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 180+ 9004 FE FE FE FD  KeyAddrTab				DW	$FEFE, $FDFE, $FBFE, $F7FE, $EFFE, $DFFE, $BFFE, $7FFE
 180+ 9008 FE FB FE F7
 180+ 900C FE EF FE DF
 180+ 9010 FE BF FE 7F
 181+ 9014              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 9014              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 9014              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 9014 E3 8F E4 8F  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 184+ 9018 E5 8F E6 8F
 184+ 901C EE 8F
 185+ 901E ED 8F DE 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 185+ 9022 D9 8F DF 8F
 185+ 9026 DA 8F
 186+ 9028 F7 8F E2 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 186+ 902C DC 8F E1 8F
 186+ 9030 E0 8F
 187+ 9032 F0 8F D4 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 187+ 9036 FA 8F F6 8F
 187+ 903A F5 8F
 188+ 903C DD 8F F3 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 188+ 9040 FB 8F D8 8F
 188+ 9044 D7 8F
 189+ 9046 E7 8F EC 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 189+ 904A EB 8F EA 8F
 189+ 904E E9 8F
 190+ 9050 D5 8F EE 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 190+ 9054 FB 8F F3 8F
 190+ 9058 DB 8F
 191+ 905A F1 8F E8 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 191+ 905E DE 8F D9 8F
 191+ 9062 DC 8F
 192+ 9064
 193+ 9064 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:           DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 193+ 9068 56
 194+ 9069 41 53 44 46                       DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 194+ 906D 47
 195+ 906E 51 57 45 52                       DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 195+ 9072 54
 196+ 9073 31 32 33 34                       DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 196+ 9077 35
 197+ 9078 30 39 38 37                       DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 197+ 907C 36
 198+ 907D 50 4F 49 55                       DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 198+ 9081 59
 199+ 9082 3E 4C 4B 4A                       DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 199+ 9086 48
 200+ 9087 20 5E 4D 4E                       DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 200+ 908B 42
 201+ 908C
 202+ 908C
 203+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 204+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 205+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 206+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 207+ 908C              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 208+ 908C              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 209+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 210+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 211+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 212+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 213+ 908C              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 214+ 908C              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle
 215+ 908C              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 216+ 908C              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 217+ 908C              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM
 218+ 908C              addr_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EnergyBomb
 219+ 908C              addr_Pressed_EscapePod     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_EscapePod
 220+ 908C              addr_Pressed_DockingComp   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_DockingComp
 221+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Hyperspace
 222+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 223+ 908C              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 224+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 225+ 908C              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 226+ 908C              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 227+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 228+ 908C              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 229+ 908C              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 230+ 908C              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 231+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 232+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 233+ 908C              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 234+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 235+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 236+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 237+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 238+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 239+ 908C              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 240+ 908C              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 241+ 908C              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 242+ 908C              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 908C
 244+ 908C
 245+ 908C              init_keyboard:
 246+ 908C 21 D4 8F     	ld		hl,Keys
 247+ 908F 11 28 00     	ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 248+ 9092 3E 00        	ld		a,0
 249+ 9094 CD 99 8F     	call	memfill_dma
 250+ 9097 C9           	ret
 251+ 9098
 252+ 9098              scan_keyboard:
 253+ 9098 21 FC 8F     	ld		hl,RawKeys
 254+ 909B 11 04 90     	ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 255+ 909E AF           	xor		a
 256+ 909F FD 2E 08     	ld		iyl,8
 257+ 90A2 DD 21 D4 8F      ld      ix,Keys
 258+ 90A6              .PortReadLoop:
 259+ 90A6 1A           	ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 260+ 90A7 4F           	ld		c,a
 261+ 90A8 13           	inc		de
 262+ 90A9 1A               ld      a,(de)
 263+ 90AA 47           	ld		b,a
 264+ 90AB 13           	inc		de
 265+ 90AC ED 78        	in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 266+ 90AE 77           	ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 267+ 90AF 23           	inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 268+ 90B0 06 05        	ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 269+ 90B2              .ProcessBitsLoop:
 270+ 90B2 CB 47        	bit		0,a								; is bit set
 271+ 90B4 28 07            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 272+ 90B6 08               ex      af,af'
 273+ 90B7 AF               xor     a
 274+ 90B8 C3 C4 90         jp      .SetKey
 275+ 90BB 20 0B        	jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 276+ 90BD              .SetKeyPressed:
 277+ 90BD 08           	ex		af,af'
 278+ 90BE DD 7E 00         ld      a,(ix+0)
 279+ 90C1 3C               inc     a
 280+ 90C2 E6 03            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 281+ 90C4              .SetKey:
 282+ 90C4 DD 77 00     	ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 90C7 08           	ex		af,af'
 284+ 90C8              .SkipKeySet:
 285+ 90C8 DD 23        	inc		ix								; move to next key
 286+ 90CA CB 3F        	srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 287+ 90CC 10 E4        	djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 288+ 90CE FD 2D            dec     iyl
 289+ 90D0 20 D4            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 290+ 90D2 C9           	ret
 291+ 90D3
 292+ 90D3              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 293+ 90D3 ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 294+ 90D3 ~                                  add     hl,a
 295+ 90D3 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 296+ 90D3 ~                                  ld      e,a
 297+ 90D3 ~                                  inc     hl
 298+ 90D3 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 299+ 90D3 ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 300+ 90D3                                    ENDM
 301+ 90D3
 302+ 90D3
 303+ 90D3              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 304+ 90D3              wait_for_key_a_press:
 305+ 90D3                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 305+ 90D3 21 14 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 305+ 90D6 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 305+ 90D8 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 305+ 90D9 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 305+ 90DA 23          >                      inc     hl
 305+ 90DB 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 305+ 90DC 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 306+ 90DD D5               push    de
 307+ 90DE              wait_for_key_press_loop:
 308+ 90DE CD 98 90         call    scan_keyboard
 309+ 90E1 E1               pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 310+ 90E2 E5               push    hl
 311+ 90E3 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 312+ 90E4                  JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 312+ 90E4 FE 01       >                cp     1
 312+ 90E6 C2 DE 90    >                jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 313+ 90E9 E1               pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 314+ 90EA C9               ret
 315+ 90EB
 316+ 90EB              wait_for_key_a_held:
 317+ 90EB                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 317+ 90EB 21 14 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 317+ 90EE ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 317+ 90F0 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 317+ 90F1 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 317+ 90F2 23          >                      inc     hl
 317+ 90F3 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 317+ 90F4 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 318+ 90F5 D5               push    de
 319+ 90F6              wait_for_key_a_held_loop:
 320+ 90F6 CD 98 90         call    scan_keyboard
 321+ 90F9 E1               pop     hl
 322+ 90FA E5               push    hl
 323+ 90FB 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 324+ 90FC                  JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 324+ 90FC FE 02       >                        cp      2
 324+ 90FE DA F6 90    >                        jp		c,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 325+ 9101 E1               pop     hl
 326+ 9102 C9               ret
 327+ 9103
 328+ 9103              get_key_a_state:                            ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 329+ 9103                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 329+ 9103 21 14 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 329+ 9106 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 329+ 9108 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 329+ 9109 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 329+ 910A 23          >                      inc     hl
 329+ 910B 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 329+ 910C 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 330+ 910D EB               ex      de,hl
 331+ 910E 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 332+ 910F C9               ret
 333+ 9110
 334+ 9110              force_key_press:
 335+ 9110                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 9110 21 14 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 9113 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 9115 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9116 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 9117 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 9118 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9119 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 911A EB               ex      de,hl
 337+ 911B 3E 01            ld      a,1
 338+ 911D 77               ld      (hl),a
 339+ 911E C9               ret
 340+ 911F
 341+ 911F              is_key_pressed:                             ; returns z is set if pressed
 342+ 911F                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 911F 21 14 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 9122 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 9124 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9125 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 9126 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 9127 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9128 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 9129 EB               ex      de,hl
 344+ 912A 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 912B FE 01            cp      1
 346+ 912D C9               ret
 347+ 912E
 348+ 912E              is_key_held:                                ; returns z is set if held
 349+ 912E                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 349+ 912E 21 14 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 349+ 9131 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 349+ 9133 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 349+ 9134 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 349+ 9135 23          >                      inc     hl
 349+ 9136 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 349+ 9137 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 350+ 9138 EB               ex      de,hl
 351+ 9139 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 352+ 913A E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 353+ 913C FE 02            cp      2
 354+ 913E C9               ret
 355+ 913F
 356+ 913F              is_any_key_pressed:
 357+ 913F 21 D4 8F         ld      hl,Keys
 358+ 9142 06 28            ld      b,40
 359+ 9144 0E 00            ld      c,0
 360+ 9146              .KeyReadLoop:
 361+ 9146 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 362+ 9147 FE 01            cp      1
 363+ 9149 CA 53 91         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 364+ 914C 23               inc     hl
 365+ 914D 0C               inc     c
 366+ 914E 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 367+ 9150 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 368+ 9152 C9               ret
 369+ 9153              .KeyPressed:
 370+ 9153 79               ld      a,c
 371+ 9154 C9               ret
 372+ 9155
 373+ 9155              is_any_key_held:
 374+ 9155 21 D4 8F         ld      hl,Keys
 375+ 9158 06 28            ld      b,40
 376+ 915A 0E 00            ld      c,0
 377+ 915C              .KeyReadLoop:
 378+ 915C 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 379+ 915D E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 380+ 915F FE 02            cp      2
 381+ 9161 CA 6B 91         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 382+ 9164 23               inc     hl
 383+ 9165 0C               inc     c
 384+ 9166 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 385+ 9168 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 386+ 916A C9               ret
 387+ 916B              .KeyPressed:
 388+ 916B 79               ld      a,c
 389+ 916C C9               ret
 390+ 916D
 391+ 916D
 392+ 916D 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 393+ 918B 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 394+ 918C 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 395+ 918D 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 396+ 918E 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 397+ 918F              InputLimit              EQU 20
 398+ 918F
 399+ 918F              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 400+ 918F 21 6D 91         ld      hl,InputString
 401+ 9192 3A 8C 91         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 402+ 9195 FE 00            cp      0
 403+ 9197 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 404+ 9199 4F               ld      c,a
 405+ 919A 06 00            ld      b,0
 406+ 919C ED B0            ldir
 407+ 919E              .NoString
 408+ 919E 3E 00            ld      a,0
 409+ 91A0 12               ld      (de),a
 410+ 91A1 C9               ret
 411+ 91A2
 412+ 91A2              initInputText:
 413+ 91A2 AF               xor     a
 414+ 91A3 32 8C 91         ld      (InputCursor),a
 415+ 91A6 32 8D 91         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 416+ 91A9 32 8E 91         ld      (InputChanged),a
 417+ 91AC 21 6D 91         ld      hl,InputString
 418+ 91AF 06 1E            ld      b,30
 419+ 91B1              .wipeloop:
 420+ 91B1 77               ld      (hl),a
 421+ 91B2 23               inc     hl
 422+ 91B3 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 423+ 91B5 C9               ret
 424+ 91B6
 425+ 91B6              InputName:
 426+ 91B6 AF               xor     a
 427+ 91B7 32 8E 91         ld      (InputChanged),a
 428+ 91BA CD 3F 91         call    is_any_key_pressed
 429+ 91BD FE FF            cp      $FF
 430+ 91BF C8               ret     z
 431+ 91C0              .KeyPressed:
 432+ 91C0 4F               ld      c,a
 433+ 91C1 3A 8C 91         ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 434+ 91C4 FE 14            cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 435+ 91C6 28 0B            jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 436+ 91C8 21 64 90         ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 437+ 91CB 79               ld      a,c
 438+ 91CC ED 31            add     hl,a
 439+ 91CE 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 440+ 91CF FE 41            cp      "A"
 441+ 91D1 30 15            jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 442+ 91D3              .DeleteOrEnterOnly                          ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 443+ 91D3 FE 30            cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 444+ 91D5 28 3B            jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 445+ 91D7 FE 3E            cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 446+ 91D9 28 24            jr      z,.EnterPressed
 447+ 91DB FE 23            cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 448+ 91DD 28 33            jr      z,.CapsPressed
 449+ 91DF FE 5E            cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 450+ 91E1 28 2F            jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 451+ 91E3 FE 20            cp      " "         ; space
 452+ 91E5 28 2B            jr      z,.SpacePressed
 453+ 91E7 C9               ret
 454+ 91E8              .AlphaPressed:
 455+ 91E8 47               ld      b,a
 456+ 91E9 3A 8C 91         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 457+ 91EC 4F               ld      c,a
 458+ 91ED 21 6D 91         ld      hl,InputString
 459+ 91F0 ED 31            add     hl,a
 460+ 91F2 78               ld      a,b
 461+ 91F3 70               ld      (hl),b
 462+ 91F4 79               ld      a,c
 463+ 91F5 21 8C 91         ld      hl,InputCursor
 464+ 91F8 34               inc     (hl)
 465+ 91F9 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 466+ 91FB 32 8E 91         ld      (InputChanged),a
 467+ 91FE C9               ret
 468+ 91FF              .EnterPressed:
 469+ 91FF 3A 8C 91         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 470+ 9202 3C               inc     a
 471+ 9203 21 6D 91         ld      hl,InputString
 472+ 9206 ED 31            add     hl,a
 473+ 9208 AF               xor     a
 474+ 9209 77               ld      (hl),a
 475+ 920A 3D               dec     a
 476+ 920B 32 8D 91         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 477+ 920E 32 8E 91         ld      (InputChanged),a
 478+ 9211 C9               ret
 479+ 9212              .CheckShiftDelete:
 480+ 9212              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 481+ 9212              .SymbolPressed:
 482+ 9212              .SpacePressed:
 483+ 9212 3A 8C 91         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 484+ 9215 FE 00            cp      0
 485+ 9217 C8               ret     z
 486+ 9218 3D               dec     a
 487+ 9219 32 8C 91         ld      (InputCursor),a
 488+ 921C 21 6D 91         ld      hl,InputString
 489+ 921F ED 31            add     hl,a
 490+ 9221 AF               xor     a
 491+ 9222 77               ld      (hl),a
 492+ 9223 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 493+ 9225 32 8E 91         ld      (InputChanged),a
 494+ 9228 C9               ret
 495+ 9229
 496+ 9229              MovementKeyTest:
 497+ 9229              ;DBG1:jp dbg1
 498+ 9229              ;dbx1:
 499+ 9229 AF               xor     a
 500+ 922A 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 501+ 922D 3A A9 93         ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 502+ 9230 E6 FC            and     $FC
 503+ 9232 20 28            jr      nz,CursorKeys
 504+ 9234              ClimbDiveKeys:
 505+ 9234 2A 22 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 506+ 9237 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 507+ 9238                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanDiveKey
 507+ 9238 FE 00       >				cp	0
 507+ 923A CA 48 92    >				jp	z,ScanDiveKey
 508+ 923D 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 509+ 9240 F6 80            or      $80
 510+ 9242 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 511+ 9245 C3 81 92         jp      ScanLeftKey
 512+ 9248              ScanDiveKey:
 513+ 9248 2A 20 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 514+ 924B 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 515+ 924C                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 515+ 924C FE 00       >				cp	0
 515+ 924E CA 81 92    >				jp	z,ScanLeftKey
 516+ 9251 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 517+ 9254 F6 40            or      $40
 518+ 9256 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 519+ 9259 C3 81 92         jp      ScanLeftKey
 520+ 925C              CursorKeys:
 521+ 925C 2A 5E 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 522+ 925F 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 523+ 9260                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanCursorDownKey
 523+ 9260 FE 00       >				cp	0
 523+ 9262 CA 70 92    >				jp	z,ScanCursorDownKey
 524+ 9265 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 525+ 9268 F6 80            or      $80
 526+ 926A 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 527+ 926D C3 81 92         jp      ScanLeftKey
 528+ 9270              ScanCursorDownKey
 529+ 9270 2A 60 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 530+ 9273 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 531+ 9274                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 531+ 9274 FE 00       >				cp	0
 531+ 9276 CA 81 92    >				jp	z,ScanLeftKey
 532+ 9279 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 533+ 927C F6 40            or      $40
 534+ 927E 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 535+ 9281              ScanLeftKey:
 536+ 9281 2A 1C 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 537+ 9284 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 538+ 9285                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRightKey
 538+ 9285 FE 00       >				cp	0
 538+ 9287 CA 93 92    >				jp	z,ScanRightKey
 539+ 928A 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 540+ 928D F6 20            or      $20
 541+ 928F 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 542+ 9292 C9               ret
 543+ 9293              ScanRightKey:
 544+ 9293 2A 1E 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 545+ 9296 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 546+ 9297                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanHomeKey
 546+ 9297 FE 00       >				cp	0
 546+ 9299 CA A5 92    >				jp	z,ScanHomeKey
 547+ 929C 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 548+ 929F F6 10            or      $10
 549+ 92A1 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 550+ 92A4 C9               ret
 551+ 92A5              ScanHomeKey:
 552+ 92A5 2A 3C 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 553+ 92A8 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 554+ 92A9                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRecentreKey
 554+ 92A9 FE 00       >				cp	0
 554+ 92AB CA B7 92    >				jp	z,ScanRecentreKey
 555+ 92AE 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 556+ 92B1 F6 08            or      $08
 557+ 92B3 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 558+ 92B6 C9               ret
 559+ 92B7              ScanRecentreKey:
 560+ 92B7 2A 58 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 561+ 92BA 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 562+ 92BB                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 562+ 92BB FE 00       >                 cp     0
 562+ 92BD C8          >                 ret    z
 563+ 92BE 3A A7 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 564+ 92C1 F6 04            or      $04
 565+ 92C3 32 A7 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 566+ 92C6 C9               ret
 567+ 92C7
 568+ 92C7
# file closed: ./Hardware/keyboard.asm

  46+ 92C7              ; Ship Data
  47+ 92C7              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
  48+ 92C7              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
  49+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
  50+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
  51+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys
  52+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  5 is #OIL  Cargo cannister
  53+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
  54+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid
  55+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
  56+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
  57+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
  58+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
  59+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
  60+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
  61+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
  62+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
  63+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
  64+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
  65+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
  66+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate
  67+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 20 is #ADA  Adder
  68+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 21 is
  69+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 22 is
  70+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 23 is
  71+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 24 is #CYL2 Last strong pirate
  72+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 25 is #ASP  Asp Mk II
  73+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 26 is #FER  Fer de Lance
  74+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 27 is
  75+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 28 is	Last of three bounty hunters
  76+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 29 is #THG  Thargoid
  77+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 30 is #TGL  Thargon
  78+ 92C7              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 31 is #CON  Constrictor
  79+ 92C7              ;;;;	.E%	\ -> &563E \ Hull NEWB bits are escpod, cop, inno, ?, pirate, angry, hunter, trader.
  80+ 92C7              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
  81+ 92C7              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
  82+ 92C7              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
  83+ 92C7              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.

 872  96EF                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 96EF              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 96EF              doRND2:
   3+ 96EF A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 96F0              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 96F0              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 96F0 3A 3B 93     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 96F3 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 96F5 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 96F6 21 3D 93     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 96F9 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 96FA 32 3B 93     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 96FD 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 96FE 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 96FF 32 3D 93                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9702 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9703 3A 3C 93                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9706 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9707 21 3E 93     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 970A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 970B 32 3C 93                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 970E 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 970F 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9710 32 3E 93                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9713 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9714 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9715
  27+ 9715              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9715 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9717 21 FE C1     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 971A              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 971A              EE55:
  32+ 971A CD F0 96     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 971D 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 971E 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 971F 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9721 C9               ret

   1+ 9722 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 9726 58 59 53 45
   1+ 972A 45 44
   2+ 972C 21 54 94     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 972F 11 89 93                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 9732 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 9734 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 9736 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 9738 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 973A ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 973C ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 973E C9                                   ret
  11+ 973F
  12+ 973F 21 89 93     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 9742 11 54 94                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 9745 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 9747
  16+ 9747 21 54 94     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 974A 11 88 94                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 974D 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 974F
  20+ 974F 21 88 94     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 9752 11 54 94                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 9755 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 9757
  24+ 9757 21 88 94     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 975A 11 89 93                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 975D 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 975F
  28+ 975F 21 89 93     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 9762 11 88 94                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 9765 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 9767
  32+ 9767              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 9767 CD 6A 97     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 976A              .NextStep:
  35+ 976A CD 6D 97     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 976D              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 976D 3A 89 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9770 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 9771 21 8B 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 9774 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 9775 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 9776 3A 8A 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 9779 21 8C 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 977C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 977D 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 977E 3A 8B 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 9781 32 89 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 9784 3A 8C 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9787 32 8A 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 978A 3A 8E 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 978D 32 8C 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9790 3A 8D 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9793 32 8B 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9796 B7           		or		a
  55+ 9797 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9798 21 8B 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 979B 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 979C 32 8D 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 979F 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 97A0 21 8C 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 97A3 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 97A4 32 8E 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 97A7 C9           		ret
  64+ 97A8
  65+ 97A8              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 97A8 CD AB 97     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 97AB              .NextStep:
  68+ 97AB CD AE 97     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 97AE              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 97AE              ; x = a + c
  71+ 97AE 3A 88 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 97B1 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 97B2 21 8A 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 97B5 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 97B6 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 97B7              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 97B7 3A 89 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 97BA 21 8B 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 97BD 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 97BE 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 97BF 3A 8A 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 97C2 32 88 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 97C5 3A 8B 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 97C8 32 89 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 97CB 3A 8D 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 97CE 32 8B 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 97D1 3A 8C 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 97D4 32 8A 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 97D7 B7           		or		a
  90+ 97D8 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 97D9 21 8A 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 97DC 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 97DD 32 8C 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 97E0 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 97E1 21 8B 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 97E4 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 97E5 32 8D 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 97E8 C9           		ret
  99+ 97E9
 100+ 97E9 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 97EA 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 97EB 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 97EC
 104+ 97EC AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 97ED 32 A2 93                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 97F0              .CounterLoop:
 107+ 97F0 3A 8A 93     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 108+ 97F3 4F           	ld		c,a
 109+ 97F4              .calcLocaldy:
 110+ 97F4 3A 53 94     	ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 111+ 97F7 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 112+ 97F8 79           	ld		a,c
 113+ 97F9 90           	sub		b
 114+ 97FA CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 115+ 97FC 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedy
 116+ 97FE              .negativedy:
 117+ 97FE ED 44        	neg
 118+ 9800              .positivedy:
 119+ 9800 32 EB 97     	ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 120+ 9803 ED 5B E9 97  	ld		de,(working_distX)
 121+ 9807 BA           	cp		d
 122+ 9808 30 24        	jr		nc,.toofar
 123+ 980A              .calcLocaldx:
 124+ 980A 3A 8C 93     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 125+ 980D 4F           	ld		c,a
 126+ 980E 3A 52 94     	ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 127+ 9811 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 128+ 9812 79           	ld		a,c
 129+ 9813 90           	sub		b
 130+ 9814 CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 131+ 9816 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedx
 132+ 9818              .negativedx:
 133+ 9818 ED 44        	neg
 134+ 981A              .positivedx:
 135+ 981A 4F           	ld		c,a
 136+ 981B BB           	cp		e
 137+ 981C 30 10        	jr		nc,.toofar
 138+ 981E              .Nearer:									; we have a closer system
 139+ 981E 3A EB 97     	ld		a,(current_distY)
 140+ 9821 47           	ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 141+ 9822 ED 43 E9 97  	ld		(working_distX),bc
 142+ 9826 C5           	push	bc
 143+ 9827 CD 5F 97     	call 	copy_system_to_working
 144+ 982A C1           	pop		bc
 145+ 982B 78           	ld		a,b								;
 146+ 982C B1           	or		c								;
 147+ 982D C8           	ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 148+ 982E              .toofar:
 149+ 982E CD 67 97     	call	next_system_seed
 150+ 9831 3A A2 93     	ld		a,(XSAV)
 151+ 9834 3D           	dec		a
 152+ 9835 FE 00        	cp		0
 153+ 9837 C8           	ret		z
 154+ 9838 32 A2 93     	ld		(XSAV),a
 155+ 983B 18 B3        	jr		.CounterLoop

 157+ 983D
 158+ 983D              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 159+ 983D 3A 89 94     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 160+ 9840 E6 07        		and		7
 161+ 9842 32 94 94     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 162+ 9845 3A 8A 94     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 163+ 9848 CB 3F        		srl	a
 164+ 984A CB 3F        		srl	a
 165+ 984C CB 3F        		srl	a
 166+ 984E CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 167+ 9850 E6 07        		and		7
 168+ 9852 32 95 94     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 169+ 9855 CB 3F        		srl	a
 170+ 9857 FE 00        		cp		0
 171+ 9859 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 172+ 985B              .Fedual:
 173+ 985B 3A 94 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 174+ 985E F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 175+ 9860 32 94 94     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 176+ 9863              .CanBeRich:
 177+ 9863 3A 94 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 178+ 9866 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 179+ 9868 32 96 94     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 180+ 986B 47           		ld		b,a
 181+ 986C 3A 8B 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 182+ 986F E6 03        		and		3
 183+ 9871 80           		add		a,b
 184+ 9872 32 96 94     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 185+ 9875 3A 95 94     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 186+ 9878 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 187+ 987A 47           		ld		b,a
 188+ 987B 3A 96 94     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 189+ 987E 80           		add		a,b
 190+ 987F 32 96 94     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 191+ 9882 CB 27        		sla		a
 192+ 9884 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 193+ 9886 47           		ld		b,a
 194+ 9887 3A 94 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 195+ 988A 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 196+ 988B 47           		ld		b,a
 197+ 988C 3A 95 94     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 198+ 988F 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 199+ 9890 32 97 94     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 200+ 9893 3A 94 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 201+ 9896 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 202+ 9898 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 203+ 989A 57           		ld		d,a
 204+ 989B 3A 95 94     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 205+ 989E C6 04        		add		4
 206+ 98A0 5F           		ld		e,a
 207+ 98A1 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 208+ 98A3 3A 97 94     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 209+ 98A6 57           		ld		d,a
 210+ 98A7 ED 30        		mul
 211+ 98A9 CB 23        		sla		e
 212+ 98AB CB 1A        		rr		d
 213+ 98AD CB 23        		sla		e
 214+ 98AF CB 1A        		rr		d
 215+ 98B1 CB 23        		sla		e
 216+ 98B3 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 217+ 98B5 ED 53 99 94  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 218+ 98B9              .DoRadius:
 219+ 98B9 3A 8B 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 220+ 98BC 4F           		ld		c,a
 221+ 98BD 3A 8D 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 222+ 98C0 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 223+ 98C2 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 224+ 98C4 47           		ld		b,a							;
 225+ 98C5 ED 43 9D 94  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 226+ 98C9 C9           		ret

  37+ 9A10
  38+ 9A10              getTableText:
  39+ 9A10              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9A10              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9A10 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9A11 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9A13 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9A15 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9A16 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9A17 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9A18 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9A19 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9A1A C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9A1B
  51+ 9A1B
  52+ 9A1B              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9A1B              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9A1B              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9A1B              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9A1B              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9A1B              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9A1B              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9A1B              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9A1B              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9A1B 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9A1C B3           	or		e
  63+ 9A1D FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9A1F C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9A20 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9A21 21 6F 99     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9A24              .testLoop:
  68+ 9A24 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9A25 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9A26 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9A27 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9A28 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9A29 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9A2A CD EB A3     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9A2D 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9A2F              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9A2F E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9A30 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9A31 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9A32 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9A33 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9A35              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9A35 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9A36 C9           	ret
  85+ 9A37
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 172+ 9E7F 3C 9E 3F 9E  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 172+ 9E83 45 9E 42 9E
 172+ 9E87 4E 9E 48 9E
 172+ 9E8B 4B 9E 51 9E
 173+ 9E8F 54 9E        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23
 174+ 9E91 57 9E 5B 9E  					DW  Text0LightYears, TextMarketPrices
 175+ 9E95 60 9E        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 176+ 9E97 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 177+ 9EB8
 178+ 9EB8              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ 9EB8              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ 9EB8
 181+ 9EB8              CapitaliseString:
 182+ 9EB8              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ 9EB8              .CapLoop:
 184+ 9EB8 23           	inc		hl
 185+ 9EB9 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ 9EBA FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ 9EBC C8           	ret		z
 188+ 9EBD FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ 9EBF 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ 9EC1 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ 9EC3 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ 9EC5              .LowerCase:
 193+ 9EC5 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ 9EC7 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ 9EC8 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ 9ECA
 197+ 9ECA              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ 9ECA 21 3B 9D     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ 9ECD ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ 9ECF ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ 9ED1 D5           	push	de
 202+ 9ED2 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ 9ED3 23           	inc		hl
 204+ 9ED4 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ 9ED5 EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ 9ED6 D1           	pop		de
 207+ 9ED7 C9           	ret
 208+ 9ED8
 209+ 9ED8
 210+ 9ED8              expandTokenToString:
 211+ 9ED8              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ 9ED8 21 61 9E     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ 9EDB CD 10 9A     	call	getTableText
 214+ 9EDE 11 97 9E     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ 9EE1              .ReadLoop:
 216+ 9EE1 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ 9EE2 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ 9EE4 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ 9EE6 E5           	push	hl
 220+ 9EE7 D5           	push	de
 221+ 9EE8 21 3B 9D     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ 9EEB CD 10 9A     	call	getTableText
 223+ 9EEE D1           	pop		de
 224+ 9EEF              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ 9EEF 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ 9EF0 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ 9EF2 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ 9EF4              ;.GetChar:
 229+ 9EF4 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ 9EF5 13           	inc		de
 231+ 9EF6 23           	inc		hl
 232+ 9EF7 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ 9EF9              .AddSpace:
 234+ 9EF9 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ 9EFB 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ 9EFC 13           	inc		de
 237+ 9EFD E1           	pop		hl
 238+ 9EFE 23           	inc		hl
 239+ 9EFF 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ 9F01              .ReadDone:
 241+ 9F01 1B           	dec		de
 242+ 9F02 AF           	xor		a
 243+ 9F03 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ 9F04 C9           	ret

 220+ 9F9F              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character

 230+ 9F9F              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'

 232+ 9F9F              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 9F9F              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy

 238+ 9F9F              ;

 246+ 9F9F              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
