 879  9F9F              ; Include all maths libraries to test assembly
 880  9F9F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhldesigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
   1+ 9F9F              addhldesigned:
   2+ 9F9F CB 7C                bit     7,h
   3+ 9FA1 20 03                jr      nz,.noneghl
   4+ 9FA3 CD F1 A3             call    negate16hl
   5+ 9FA6              .noneghl:
   6+ 9FA6 CB 7A                bit     7,d
   7+ 9FA8 20 03                jr      nz,.nonegde
   8+ 9FAA CD F8 A3             call    negate16de
   9+ 9FAD              .nonegde:
  10+ 9FAD 19                   add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  11+ 9FAE AF                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  12+ 9FAF CB 7C                bit     7,h
  13+ 9FB1 C8                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  14+ 9FB2 CD F1 A3             call    negate16hl
  15+ 9FB5 3E FF                ld      a,$FF
  16+ 9FB7 C9                   ret
  17+ 9FB8
# file closed: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
 881  9FB8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ 9FB8
   2+ 9FB8              ; a = value to add
   3+ 9FB8              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
   4+ 9FB8              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
   5+ 9FB8              addINWKbasigned:
   6+ 9FB8 21 0B C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
   7+ 9FBB 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
   8+ 9FBC 78           		ld		a,b
   9+ 9FBD ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
  10+ 9FBF 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
  11+ 9FC0 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
  12+ 9FC2 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
  13+ 9FC3 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
  14+ 9FC4 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
  15+ 9FC6              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
  16+ 9FC6              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
  17+ 9FC6              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
  18+ 9FC6              addhlcsigned:
  19+ 9FC6 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
  20+ 9FC7 23                   inc     hl
  21+ 9FC8 56                   ld      d,(hl)
  22+ 9FC9 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
  23+ 9FCA 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
  24+ 9FCB EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
  25+ 9FCC A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
  26+ 9FCD CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
  27+ 9FCF 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
  28+ 9FD1              .negativecalc:
  29+ 9FD1 7C                   ld      a,h
  30+ 9FD2 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ 9FD4 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
  32+ 9FD5 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
  33+ 9FD7 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
  34+ 9FD9 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ 9FDB DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
  36+ 9FDD EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
  37+ 9FDE 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
  38+ 9FDF E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ 9FE1 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
  40+ 9FE3 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
  41+ 9FE5 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
  42+ 9FE6 77                   ld      (hl),a
  43+ 9FE7 2B                   dec     hl
  44+ 9FE8 72                   ld      (hl),d
  45+ 9FE9 2B                   dec     hl
  46+ 9FEA 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
  47+ 9FEB EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  48+ 9FEC D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
  49+ 9FED              .nocarry:
  50+ 9FED CD F1 A3             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
  51+ 9FF0 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
  52+ 9FF1 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  53+ 9FF2 73                   ld      (hl),e
  54+ 9FF3 23                   inc     hl
  55+ 9FF4 72                   ld      (hl),d
  56+ 9FF5 23                   inc     hl
  57+ 9FF6 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
  58+ 9FF7 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
  59+ 9FF8 C9                   ret
  60+ 9FF9              .postivecalc:
  61+ 9FF9 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
  62+ 9FFB 06 00                ld      b,0
  63+ 9FFD 19                   add     hl,de
  64+ 9FFE EB                   ex      de,hl
  65+ 9FFF DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
  66+ A001 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
  67+ A002 2B                   dec     hl
  68+ A003 72                   ld      (hl),d
  69+ A004 2B                   dec     hl
  70+ A005 73                   ld      (hl),e
  71+ A006 C9                   ret
  72+ A007
  73+ A007              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
  74+ A007              ;MVT1
  75+ A007              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
  76+ A007              ;    A = sign bit => T
  77+ A007              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
  78+ A007              ;    if negative thn its not an add
  79+ A007              ;
  80+ A007              ;        and h, 7F
  81+ A007              ;        b = 0
  82+ A007              ;        c = varS
  83+ A007              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
  84+ A007              ;        retain carry
  85+ A007              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
  86+ A007              ;        and 7F
  87+ A007              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
  88+ A007              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
  89+ A007              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
  90+ A007              ;
  91+ A007              ;    else
  92+ A007              ;MV10.
  93+ A007              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
  94+ A007              ;        or      sign bit
  95+ A007
  96+ A007
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
 882  A007                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
   1+ A007              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A007 2A B9 96     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A00A 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A00B 22 B9 96                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A00E 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A011 2A BB 96                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A014 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A016 22 BB 96                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A019 C9                                   ret
  10+ A01A
  11+ A01A 2A B9 96     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A01D 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A01E B5                                   or      l
  14+ A01F 2A BB 96                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A022 B4                                   or      h
  16+ A023 B5                                   or      l
  17+ A024 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A025 B7                                   or      a
  19+ A026 2A B9 96                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A029 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A02B 22 B9 96                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A02E 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A031 2A BB 96                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A034 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A036 22 BB 96                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A039                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A039 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A03B C2 3F A0    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A03E C9                                   ret
  28+ A03F 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A042 22 B9 96                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A045 22 BB 96                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A048 C9                                   ret
  32+ A049
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
 883  A049                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ A049              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A049 2A 9E 93                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A04C 3A 9D 93                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A04F C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A051 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A054 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A055                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A055 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A057 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ A059 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ A05B 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A05D EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A05E 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A05F EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A060              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ A060 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ A062 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ A064 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ A066 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ A068 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ A06A EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A06B D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A06D C9                                   ret
  20+ A06E
  21+ A06E
  22+ A06E              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A06E ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A06E ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A06E ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A06E ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A06E ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A06E ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A06E ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A06E ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A06E ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A06E ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A06E ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A06E ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A06E ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A06E ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A06E ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A06E ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A06E                                      ENDM
  40+ A06E
  41+ A06E
  42+ A06E
  43+ A06E                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ A06E              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ A06E 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ A06F 3A 9D 93    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ A072 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A073 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ A074 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ A076 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ A077 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ A078 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A07A 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ A07B 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ A07C E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A07E 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A07F ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ A081 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ A082 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ A083 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ A084 2A 9E 93     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ A087 CD 90 A0                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ A08A EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ A08B                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ A08B B7          >				or a
  49+ A08C DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ A08E 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ A08F C9                                   ret
  52+ A090
  53+ A090
  54+ A090 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A091 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A093 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A094 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A095                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A095 FA AD A0    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A098 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A099 B2                                   or      d
  61+ A09A                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A09A FA 9F A0    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A09D 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A09E C9                                   ret
  64+ A09F 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A0A0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A0A2 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A0A3 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A0A4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A0A6 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A0A7 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A0A8 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A0AA B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A0AB 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A0AC C9                                   ret
  75+ A0AD 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A0AE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A0B0 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A0B1 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A0B2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A0B4 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A0B5 B7                                   or      a
  82+ A0B6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A0B8 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A0BA 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A0BB B4                                   or      h
  86+ A0BC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A0BD C9                                   ret
  88+ A0BE              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A0BE AF          >                xor a
  88+ A0BF 95          >                sub l
  88+ A0C0 6F          >                ld l,a
  88+ A0C1 9F          >                sbc a,a
  88+ A0C2 94          >                sub h
  88+ A0C3 67          >                ld h,a
  89+ A0C4 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A0C5 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A0C7 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A0C8 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A0C9 C9                                   ret
  94+ A0CA
  95+ A0CA
  96+ A0CA                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A0CA                  ;
  98+ A0CA                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A0CA                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A0CA                  ;
 101+ A0CA                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A0CA                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A0CA                  ;
 104+ A0CA                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A0CA 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A0CB 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A0CC ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A0CE EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A0CF ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A0D1
 111+ A0D1 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A0D2 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A0D3 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A0D4 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A0D5
 116+ A0D5 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A0D6 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A0D8 C9                                   ret
 119+ A0D9
 120+ A0D9
 121+ A0D9
 122+ A0D9                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A0D9                 ;
 124+ A0D9                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A0D9                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A0D9                 ;
 127+ A0D9                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A0D9                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A0D9                 ;
 130+ A0D9                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A0D9
 132+ A0D9
 133+ A0D9
 134+ A0D9 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A0DA 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A0DB 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A0DC 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A0DD E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A0DE 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A0DF              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A0DF ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A0E1 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A0E2 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A0E4
 145+ A0E4 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A0E5 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A0E6 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A0E7
 149+ A0E7 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A0E8 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A0E9 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A0EB
 153+ A0EB 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A0EC 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A0ED
 156+ A0ED 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A0EE 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A0EF 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A0F0 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A0F1
 161+ A0F1 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A0F2 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A0F4
 164+ A0F4 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A0F5 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A0F7 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A0F8
 168+ A0F8 C9                                   ret
 169+ A0F9
 170+ A0F9              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A0F9              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A0F9              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A0F9              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A0F9              ;         carry reset
 175+ A0F9              ; maths is
 176+ A0F9              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A0F9              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A0F9              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A0F9              ;
 180+ A0F9              ;
 181+ A0F9              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A0F9 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A0FA 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A0FB 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A0FC 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A0FD 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A0FE 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A0FF ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A101 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A102 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A104 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A105 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A106 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A107 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A109 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A10A 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A10B 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A10C 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A10D                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A10D AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A10E C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A10F C9                                   ret
 203+ A110
 204+ A110              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 205+ A110              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 206+ A110              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 207+ A110              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 208+ A110              ;         carry reset
 209+ A110              ;
 210+ A110              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 211+ A110 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 212+ A111 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 213+ A112 32 10 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 214+ A115 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 215+ A116 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 216+ A119 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 217+ A11B E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 218+ A11D 57                                   ld      d,a
 219+ A11E 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 220+ A120 32 10 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 221+ A123 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 222+ A124 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 223+ A127 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 224+ A129 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 225+ A12B 67                                   ld      h,a
 226+ A12C 3A 10 A1                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 227+ A12F EE 80                                xor     $80
 228+ A131 32 10 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 229+ A134 CD F9 A0     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 230+ A137 3A 10 A1     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 231+ A13A ED 27 80                             test    $80
 232+ A13D C8                                   ret     z
 233+ A13E AF           .Negateghl: 				xor 	a
 234+ A13F 95                                   sub 	l
 235+ A140 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 236+ A141 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 237+ A142 94                                   sub 	h
 238+ A143 67                                   ld 		h,a
 239+ A144 C9                                   ret
 240+ A145
 241+ A145 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 242+ A146 32 10 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A149 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A14A ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A14D 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 246+ A14F E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A151 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A152 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A154 32 10 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A157 CD F9 A0     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 251+ A15A 3A 10 A1     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 252+ A15D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 253+ A160 C8                                   ret     z
 254+ A161 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 255+ A162 95                                   sub 	l
 256+ A163 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 257+ A164 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 258+ A165 94                                   sub 	h
 259+ A166 67                                   ld 		h,a
 260+ A167 C9                                   ret

 884  A168                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A168              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A168              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A168
   4+ A168              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A168 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A168 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A168 ~            			mul
   8+ A168              			ENDM
   9+ A168
  10+ A168              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A168 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A168 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A168 ~            			mul
  14+ A168 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A168              			ENDM
  16+ A168
  17+ A168
  18+ A168              asm_squa:
  19+ A168 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A16A              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A16A              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A16A              asm_squa2:
  23+ A16A 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A16B 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A16C ED 30        	mul
  26+ A16E ED 53 42 93  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A172 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A173 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 885  A174                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A174              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A174              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A174              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A174              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A174              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A174              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A174 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A177 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A178 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A179              .sqrloop:
  11+ A179 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A17B CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A17D 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A17E EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A17F ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A181 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A183 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A184 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A185 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A187              .sqrbit:
  21+ A187 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A188 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A189 B7           	or a
  24+ A18A ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A18C              .sqrfi:
  26+ A18C CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A18E CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A190 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A192 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A194 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A196 C9           	ret
  32+ A197
  33+ A197
  34+ A197              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A197 3A 9D 93     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A19A 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A19B 3A 9E 93     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A19E 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A19F CD 74 A1     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A1A2 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A1A3 32 9D 93     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A1A6 C9           	ret
  43+ A1A7
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 886  A1A7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A1A7              ; Divide 8-bit values
   2+ A1A7              ; In: Divide E by divider C
   3+ A1A7              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
   4+ A1A7              ;
   5+ A1A7              ;;;Div8:
   6+ A1A7              ;;;    xor a
   7+ A1A7              ;;;    ld b,8
   8+ A1A7              ;;;Div8_Loop:
   9+ A1A7              ;;;    rl e
  10+ A1A7              ;;;    rla
  11+ A1A7              ;;;    sub c
  12+ A1A7              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  13+ A1A7              ;;;    add a,c
  14+ A1A7              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  15+ A1A7              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  16+ A1A7              ;;;    ld b,a
  17+ A1A7              ;;;    ld a,e
  18+ A1A7              ;;;    rla
  19+ A1A7              ;;;    cpl
  20+ A1A7              ;;;    ret
  21+ A1A7
  22+ A1A7              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  23+ A1A7              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  24+ A1A7              ;;         A is a copy of E
  25+ A1A7              ;;         HL is the remainder
  26+ A1A7              ;;         BC is not changed
  27+ A1A7              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  28+ A1A7              ;140 bytes
  29+ A1A7              ;145cc
  30+ A1A7
  31+ A1A7              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  32+ A1A7 ~                                rla
  33+ A1A7 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  34+ A1A7 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A1A7 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  36+ A1A7 ~                                add     hl,bc
  37+ A1A7                                  ENDM
  38+ A1A7
  39+ A1A7              DEequDEDivBC:
  40+ A1A7 AF               xor a
  41+ A1A8 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  42+ A1AA 7A               ld a,d

  69+ A233
  70+ A233
  71+ A233              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  72+ A233              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  73+ A233              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  74+ A233              ; Our use
  75+ A233              ; BC = A0
  76+ A233              ; DE = 0C
  77+ A233              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
  78+ A233              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
  78+ A233 B9          >                        cp     c
  78+ A234 D2 5F A2    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
  79+ A237 47                                   ld      b,a
  80+ A238 59                                   ld      e,c
  81+ A239 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  82+ A23B 16 00                                ld      d,0
  83+ A23D C3 4A A2                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
  84+ A240 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
  85+ A241 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  86+ A243 21 9D 93                             ld      hl,varQ
  87+ A246 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  88+ A247 16 00                                ld      d,0
  89+ A249 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90+ A24A              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
  91+ A24A 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
  92+ A24D 78                                   ld      a,b
  93+ A24E 06 10                                ld      b,16
  94+ A250 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
  95+ A252 17                                   rla			; ...
  96+ A253 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
  97+ A255 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
  98+ A257 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  99+ A259 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 100+ A25A 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 101+ A25B 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 102+ A25D 47                                   ld   b,a
 103+ A25E C9                                   ret
 104+ A25F 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 105+ A262 C9                                   ret
 106+ A263
 107+ A263              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 108+ A263 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 109+ A265 AF                                   xor a
 110+ A266 CB 21        div8_loop:	            sla c
 111+ A268 17                                   rla
 112+ A269 BA                                   cp d
 113+ A26A 38 02                                jr c,div8_skip
 113+ A26C
 114+ A26C 0C                                   inc c
 115+ A26D 92                                   sub d
 116+ A26E 10 F6        div8_skip:	            djnz div8_loop
 117+ A270 C9                                   ret
 118+ A271              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 119+ A271 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 120+ A273 AF                                   xor a
 121+ A274 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 122+ A276 CB 14                                rl	h
 123+ A278              ;    add hl,hl
 124+ A278 17                                   rla
 125+ A279 B9                                   cp c
 126+ A27A 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 127+ A27C 2C                                   inc l
 128+ A27D 91                                   sub c
 129+ A27E 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 130+ A280 C9                                   ret
 131+ A281              ;
 132+ A281              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 133+ A281              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 134+ A281              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 135+ A281              ;
 136+ A281              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 137+ A281 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 138+ A281 ~            					rla				; ...
 139+ A281 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 140+ A281 ~            					jr	1F
 141+ A281 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 142+ A281 ~            1:
 143+ A281 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 144+ A281              					ENDM

 148+ A281              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"

 152+ A287 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla

 179+ A2A7 ~            				   rla

 187+ A2A7
 188+ A2A7              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 189+ A2A7              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 190+ A2A7              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 191+ A2A7              ;min: 738cc
 192+ A2A7              ;max: 898cc
 193+ A2A7              ;avg: 818cc
 194+ A2A7              ;144 bytes
 195+ A2A7 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 196+ A2A8 67                                   ld h,a
 197+ A2A9 6F                                   ld l,a
 198+ A2AA 93                                   sub e
 199+ A2AB 5F                                   ld e,a

 203+ A2AF 78                                   ld a,b
