 223+ A32B                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 223+ A32B 17          >				   rla
 223+ A32C ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 223+ A32E 19          >				   add	hl,de
 223+ A32F 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 223+ A331 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 223+ A333             >1:
 224+ A333 17                                   rla
 225+ A334 4F                                   ld c,a
 226+ A335 C9                                   ret
 227+ A336
 228+ A336              ;Inputs:
 229+ A336              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 230+ A336              ;Outputs:
 231+ A336              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 232+ A336              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 233+ A336              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 234+ A336              ;Otherwise:
 235+ A336              ;min: 1107cc
 236+ A336              ;max: 1319cc
 237+ A336              ;avg: 1201cc
 238+ A336 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 239+ A337 AA                                   xor d
 240+ A338 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 241+ A339              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 242+ A339 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 243+ A33A F2 43 A3                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 244+ A33D AF                                   xor a
 245+ A33E 91                                   sub c
 246+ A33F 4F                                   ld c,a
 247+ A340 9F                                   sbc a,a
 248+ A341 90                                   sub b
 249+ A342 47                                   ld b,a
 250+ A343 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 251+ A344 B2                                   or d
 252+ A345 FA 4E A3                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 253+ A348 AF                                   xor a
 254+ A349 93                                   sub e
 255+ A34A 5F                                   ld e,a
 256+ A34B 9F                                   sbc a,a
 257+ A34C 92                                   sub d
 258+ A34D 57                                   ld d,a
 259+ A34E B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 260+ A34F 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 261+ A351 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 262+ A353 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 263+ A354 83                                   add a,e
 264+ A355 7A                                   ld a,d
 265+ A356 8C                                   adc a,h
 266+ A357 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 267+ A359 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 268+ A35A 79                                   ld a,c
 269+ A35B CD 76 A3                             call div_fixed88_sub
 270+ A35E 4F                                   ld c,a
 271+ A35F 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 272+ A360 CD 76 A3                             call div_fixed88_sub
 273+ A363 51                                   ld d,c
 274+ A364 5F                                   ld e,a
 275+ A365 F1                                   pop af
 276+ A366 F0                                   ret p
 277+ A367 AF                                   xor a
 278+ A368 93                                   sub e
 279+ A369 5F                                   ld e,a
 280+ A36A 9F                                   sbc a,a
 281+ A36B 92                                   sub d
 282+ A36C 57                                   ld d,a
 283+ A36D C9                                   ret
 284+ A36E
 285+ A36E 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 286+ A371 F1                                   pop af
 287+ A372 F0                                   ret p
 288+ A373 13                                   inc de
 289+ A374 1C                                   inc e
 290+ A375 C9                                   ret
 291+ A376
 292+ A376              ;min: 456cc
 293+ A376              ;max: 536cc
 294+ A376              ;avg: 496cc
 295+ A376 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 296+ A378 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 297+ A379 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 298+ A37B 19                                   add hl,de
 299+ A37C 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 300+ A37E ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 301+ A380 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 302+ A382 8F                                   adc a,a
 303+ A383 C9                                   ret
 304+ A384
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 887  A384                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ A384              asm_tis2:
   2+ A384              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ A384              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ A384 F5           	push af
   5+ A385 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ A387 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ A388 3A 9D 93     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ A38B 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ A38C 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ A38D BB           	cp e
  11+ A38E 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ A390 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ A392 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ A394 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A395 3A 9D 93     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ A398 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ A399 CD 71 A2     	call asm_div16
  18+ A39C F1           	pop af
  19+ A39D E6 80        	and $80
  20+ A39F B5           	or l
  21+ A3A0 C9           	ret
  22+ A3A1              .tis2_set96:
  23+ A3A1 F1           	pop af
  24+ A3A2 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ A3A4 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ A3A6 C9           	ret
  27+ A3A7
  28+ A3A7
  29+ A3A7              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ A3A7              squareregfx:
  31+ A3A7 3A 74 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ A3AA 57           	ld d,a
  33+ A3AB 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ A3AC ED 30        	mul
  35+ A3AE EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ A3AF              squareregfy:
  37+ A3AF 3A 76 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ A3B2 57           	ld d,a
  39+ A3B3 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ A3B4 ED 30        	mul
  41+ A3B6 19           	add hl,de
  42+ A3B7              squareregfz:
  43+ A3B7 3A 78 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ A3BA 57           	ld d,a
  45+ A3BB 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ A3BC ED 30        	mul
  47+ A3BE 19           	add hl,de
  48+ A3BF EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ A3C0              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ A3C0 CD 74 A1     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ A3C3 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ A3C4 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ A3C5 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ A3C6              normfx:
  55+ A3C6 3A 74 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ A3C9 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ A3CA 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ A3CB 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ A3CC CD 84 A3     	call asm_tis2
  60+ A3CF 32 74 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ A3D2              normfy:
  62+ A3D2 3A 76 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ A3D5 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ A3D6 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ A3D7 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ A3D8 CD 84 A3     	call asm_tis2
  67+ A3DB 32 76 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ A3DE              normfz:
  69+ A3DE 3A 78 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ A3E1 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ A3E2 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ A3E3 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ A3E4 CD 84 A3     	call asm_tis2
  74+ A3E7 32 78 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ A3EA              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ A3EA C9           	ret
  77+ A3EB
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 888  A3EB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ A3EB              compare16HLDE:
   2+ A3EB              ; Input:
   3+ A3EB              ;       HL = 1st value
   4+ A3EB              ;       DE = 2nd value
   5+ A3EB              ; Output:
   6+ A3EB              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   7+ A3EB              ;
   8+ A3EB              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   9+ A3EB              ;               -----------------------------------
  10+ A3EB              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  11+ A3EB              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  12+ A3EB              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  13+ A3EB              ;               1       1       Impossible
  14+ A3EB              ;
  15+ A3EB E5           		push    hl
  16+ A3EC A7           		and     a
  17+ A3ED ED 52        		sbc     hl,de
  18+ A3EF E1           		pop     hl
  19+ A3F0 C9           		ret
  20+ A3F1
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 889  A3F1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ A3F1              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ A3F1              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ A3F1              negate16:
   4+ A3F1              negate16hl:
   5+ A3F1                      ; Input:
   6+ A3F1                      ;       HL = value
   7+ A3F1                      ; Output:
   8+ A3F1                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ A3F1                      ; Destroys:
  10+ A3F1                      ;       AF
  11+ A3F1                      ;
  12+ A3F1 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ A3F2 95           	sub 	l
  14+ A3F3 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ A3F4 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ A3F5 94           	sub 	h
  17+ A3F6 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ A3F7 C9           	ret
  19+ A3F8
  20+ A3F8              negate16de:
  21+ A3F8 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ A3F9 93           	sub 	e
  23+ A3FA 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ A3FB 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ A3FC 92           	sub 	d
  26+ A3FD 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ A3FE C9           	ret
  28+ A3FF
  29+ A3FF              negate16bc:
  30+ A3FF AF           	xor 	a
  31+ A400 91           	sub 	c
  32+ A401 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ A402 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ A403 90           	sub 	b
  35+ A404 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ A405 C9           	ret
  37+ A406
  38+ A406
  39+ A406              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ A406 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ A406 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ A406 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ A406 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ A406 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ A406 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ A406              					ENDM
  47+ A406
  48+ A406              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ A406 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ A406 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ A406 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ A406 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ A406 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ A406 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ A406              					ENDM
  56+ A406              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ A406 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ A406 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ A406 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ A406 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ A406 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ A406 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ A406              					ENDM
  64+ A406
  65+ A406              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ A406 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ A406 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ A406 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ A406 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ A406 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ A406 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ A406              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 890  A406                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ A406 DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ A408                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ A408 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A409 D2 1E A4    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ A40C 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ A40D CD 63 A2                             call		asm_div8
   5+ A410 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ A411 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ A413 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ A414 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ A416 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ A417 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ A418 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ A41A E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ A41C B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ A41D C9                                   ret
  15+ A41E              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ A41E              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ A41E DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ A420 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ A422 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ A424 C9                                   ret
  21+ A425
  22+ A425
  23+ A425
  24+ A425
  25+ A425              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ A425                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ A425 3A 74 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ A428 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ A42A E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ A42C              N96SQX:
  31+ A42C              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ A42C 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ A42D 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ A42E ED 30       >			mul
  32+ A430 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ A431 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ A432              N96SQY:
  35+ A432 3A 75 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ A435 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ A437 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ A439              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ A439 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ A43A 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ A43B ED 30       >			mul
  39+ A43D 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ A43E              N96SQZ:
  41+ A43E 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ A441 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ A443 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ A445              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ A445 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ A446 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ A447 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ A449              N96SQADD:
  46+ A449 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ A44A EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ A44B              N96SQRT:
  49+ A44B CD 74 A1     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ A44E              N96NORMX:
  51+ A44E 3A 74 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ A451 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ A453 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ A454 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ A455 CD 32 A6     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ A458 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ A459 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ A45B E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ A45D B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ A45E 32 74 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ A461              N96NORMY:
  62+ A461 3A 75 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ A464 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ A466 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ A467 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ A468 CD 32 A6     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ A46B 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ A46C DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ A46E E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ A470 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ A471 32 75 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ A474              N96NORMZ:
  73+ A474 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ A477 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ A479 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ A47A 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ A47B CD 32 A6     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ A47E 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ A47F FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ A481 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ A483 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ A484 32 76 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ A487 C9           	ret
  84+ A488
  85+ A488              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  86+ A488 3A 74 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  87+ A48B                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  87+ A48B 5F          >			ld	e,a
  87+ A48C 57          >			ld  d,a
  87+ A48D ED 30       >			mul
  88+ A48F 7A                                   ld		a,d
  89+ A490 32 9E 93                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  90+ A493 7B                                   ld		a,e
  91+ A494 32 9D 93                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
  92+ A497 32 42 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
  93+ A49A 3A 75 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
  94+ A49D                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  94+ A49D 5F          >			ld	e,a
  94+ A49E 57          >			ld  d,a
  94+ A49F ED 30       >			mul
  95+ A4A1 7A                                   ld		a,d
  96+ A4A2 32 BD 93                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
  97+ A4A5 7B                                   ld		a,e
  98+ A4A6 32 42 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
  99+ A4A9 21 9D 93                             ld		hl,varQ
 100+ A4AC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 101+ A4AD 32 9D 93                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 102+ A4B0 3A BD 93                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 103+ A4B3 21 9E 93                             ld		hl,varR
 104+ A4B6 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 105+ A4B7 32 9E 93                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 106+ A4BA 3A 76 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 107+ A4BD                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 107+ A4BD 5F          >			ld	e,a
 107+ A4BE 57          >			ld  d,a
 107+ A4BF ED 30       >			mul
 108+ A4C1 7A                                   ld		a,d
 109+ A4C2 32 BD 93                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 110+ A4C5 7B                                   ld		a,e
 111+ A4C6 32 42 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 112+ A4C9 21 9D 93                             ld		hl,varQ
 113+ A4CC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 114+ A4CD 32 9D 93                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 115+ A4D0 3A BD 93                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 116+ A4D3 21 9E 93                             ld		hl,varR
 117+ A4D6 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 118+ A4D7 32 9E 93                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 119+ A4DA CD 97 A1                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 120+ A4DD 3A 74 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 121+ A4E0 CD 2C A6                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 122+ A4E3 32 74 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 123+ A4E6 3A 75 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 124+ A4E9 CD 2C A6                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 125+ A4EC 32 75 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 126+ A4EF 3A 75 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 127+ A4F2 CD 2C A6                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 128+ A4F5 32 75 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 129+ A4F8 C9                                   ret
 130+ A4F9
 131+ A4F9
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 891  A4F9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ A4F9              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ A4F9              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ A4F9              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ A4F9              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ A4F9              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ A4F9              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ A4F9              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ A4F9 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ A4FC CD 12 A5     	call	Num1
  10+ A4FF 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ A502 CD 12 A5     	call	Num1
  12+ A505 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ A508 CD 12 A5     	call	Num1
  14+ A50B 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ A50D CD 12 A5     	call	Num1
  16+ A510 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ A512              Num1:
  18+ A512 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ A514              .Num2:
  20+ A514 3C           	inc	a
  21+ A515 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ A516 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ A518 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ A51A 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ A51B 13           	inc	de
  26+ A51C C9           	ret
  27+ A51D
  28+ A51D              DispAtoDE:
  29+ A51D 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ A51F 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ A520 C3 F9 A4     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ A523
  33+ A523              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ A523 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ A525 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ A526 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ A529 CD 39 A5     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ A52C 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ A52E CD 12 A5     	call	Num1
  40+ A531 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ A533 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ A534 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ A535 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ A537 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ A539              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ A539 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ A53B              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ A53B 3C           	inc	a
  49+ A53C 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ A53D 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ A53F FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ A541 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ A543              .Blank:
  54+ A543 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ A545              .DontBlank:
  56+ A545 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ A547 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ A548 13           	inc	de
  59+ A549 C9           	ret
  60+ A54A
  61+ A54A              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ A54A FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ A54C 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ A54E 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ A550 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ A551 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ A554 CD 60 A5     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ A557 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ A559 CD 60 A5     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ A55C 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ A55E 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ A560              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ A560 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ A562              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ A562 3C           	inc	a
  76+ A563 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ A564 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ A566 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ A568 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ A56A              .Blank:
  81+ A56A 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ A56C              .DontBlank:
  83+ A56C ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ A56E 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ A56F 13           	inc	de
  86+ A570 C9           	ret
  87+ A571              .NoStock:
  88+ A571 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ A573 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ A574 13           	inc	de
  91+ A575 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ A576 13           	inc	de
  93+ A577 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ A579 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ A57A 13           	inc de
  96+ A57B C9           	ret
  97+ A57C
  98+ A57C
  99+ A57C              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ A57C              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ A57C              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ A57C              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ A57C 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ A580 0A 00 00 00
 103+ A584 64 00 00 00
 103+ A588 E8 03 00 00
 103+ A58C 10 27 00 00
 104+ A590 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ A594 40 42 0F 00
 104+ A598 80 96 98 00
 104+ A59C 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ A5A0 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ A5A4 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ A5A8
 107+ A5A8              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ A5A8 CD B7 A5     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ A5AB FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ A5AE FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ A5B1 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ A5B3 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ A5B6 C9                                   ret
 114+ A5B7
 115+ A5B7 DD 22 A4 A5  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ A5BB ED 53 A6 A5                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ A5BF DD 21 A0 A5                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ A5C3 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ A5C5 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ A5C7 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ A5C9 B7                                   or a
 122+ A5CA DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ A5CD DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ A5D0 2A A4 A5                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ A5D3 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ A5D5 22 A4 A5                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ A5D8 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ A5DB DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ A5DE 2A A6 A5                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ A5E1 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ A5E3 22 A6 A5                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ A5E6 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ A5E8 0C                                   inc c
 134+ A5E9 3C                                   inc a
 135+ A5EA 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ A5EC DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ A5EF DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ A5F2 2A A4 A5                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ A5F5 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ A5F6 22 A4 A5                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ A5F9 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ A5FC DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ A5FF 2A A6 A5                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ A602 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ A604 22 A6 A5                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ A607 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ A60A DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ A60C 0C                                   inc c
 149+ A60D 0D                                   dec c
 150+ A60E 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ A610 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ A613 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ A615 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ A617 3A A4 A5                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ A61A C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ A61C FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ A61F FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ A623 C9                                   ret
 159+ A624
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 892  A624              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 893  A624              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 894  A624                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ A624
   2+ A624              ; USES 			A DE BC
   3+ A624              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
   4+ A624              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
   5+ A624 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
   6+ A626 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
   7+ A628 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
   8+ A62A CB FF        	set			7,a
   9+ A62C              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  10+ A62C              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  11+ A62C              TIS2:
  12+ A62C 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  13+ A62D 3A 9D 93     	ld			a,(varQ)
  14+ A630 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  15+ A631 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  16+ A632              AequAdivDmul96:
  17+ A632 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  18+ A633 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  19+ A635              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  19+ A635 BA          >                        cp     d
  19+ A636 D2 56 A6    >                        jp		nc,TIS2AccGTEQ
  20+ A639 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  21+ A63B              TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  22+ A63B CB 27        	sla			a
  23+ A63D              	JumpIfALTNusng d,TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  23+ A63D BA          >                        cp      d
  23+ A63E DA 5C A6    >                        jp		c,TIS2SkipSub
  24+ A641 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  25+ A642 37           	scf
  26+ A643 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  27+ A645 38 F4        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  28+ A647              TIS2SKIPCont:
  29+ A647 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  30+ A648 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  31+ A64A CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  32+ A64C 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  33+ A64D CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  34+ A64F 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  35+ A650 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  36+ A651 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  37+ A652 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  38+ A654 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  39+ A655 C9           	ret
  40+ A656              TIS2AccGTEQ:
  41+ A656              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  42+ A656 79           	ld			a,c
  43+ A657 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  44+ A659 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  45+ A65B C9           	ret
  46+ A65C              TIS2SkipSub:
  47+ A65C B7           	or			a
  48+ A65D CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ A65F 38 DA        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ A661 C3 47 A6     	jp			TIS2SKIPCont
  51+ A664
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 895  A664                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ A664              fmltu:
   2+ A664              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ A664              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ A664 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ A665 3A 9D 93     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ A668 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A669 ED 30        	mul
   8+ A66B 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ A66C C9           	ret
  10+ A66D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 896  A66D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ A66D              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ A66D              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ A66D 21 76 96     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ A670 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ A672 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ A674 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ A675 C3 81 A6     		jp		DV41
   8+ A678              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ A678 21 76 96     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ A67B 3A CC 92     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ A67E ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ A680 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ A681              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ A681 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ A682 3A 99 93     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ A685              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ A685 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ A687 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ A689 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ A68A AF           		xor		a
  21+ A68B              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ A68B CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ A68D 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ A68F BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ A690 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ A692              DV8:
  27+ A692 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ A693 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ A694              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ A694 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ A696 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ A698              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ A698              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ A698 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ A69A 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ A69B              .RollRemainder:
  37+ A69B CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ A69D 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ A69F B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ A6A0 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ A6A2              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ A6A2 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ A6A3              .DontSBC:
  44+ A6A3 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ A6A5 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ A6A7 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ A6A8 32 9E 93     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ A6AB 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ A6AC 32 42 93     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ A6AF C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ A6B0              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ A6B0 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ A6B1 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ A6B2 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ A6B4 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ A6B6 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ A6B7 32 9E 93     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ A6BA 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ A6BB 32 42 93     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ A6BE C9           		ret
  61+ A6BF              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ A6BF 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ A6C1 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ A6C2 32 9E 93     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ A6C5 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ A6C6 32 42 93     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ A6C9 C9           		ret
  68+ A6CA
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 897  A6CA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ A6CA
   2+ A6CA              asm_defmutl:
   3+ A6CA              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ A6CA              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ A6CA ED 30        	mul
   6+ A6CC 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ A6CD C9           	ret
   8+ A6CE
   9+ A6CE
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 898  A6CE              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 899  A6CE              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 900  A6CE              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 901  A6CE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ A6CE              APequQmulA:
   2+ A6CE              asm_mult1:
   3+ A6CE              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ A6CE FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ A6D0 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ A6D2 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A6D3 3A 9D 93     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ A6D6 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ A6D7 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ A6D9 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ A6DB AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ A6DC E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ A6DE 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ A6DF 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ A6E0 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ A6E2 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ A6E3 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ A6E4 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ A6E6 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ A6E7 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ A6E9 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ A6EA 32 42 93     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ A6ED 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ A6EE B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ A6EF 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ A6F0 C9           	ret
  27+ A6F1              .mul0:
  28+ A6F1 AF           	xor	a
  29+ A6F2 32 42 93     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ A6F5 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ A6F6 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ A6F7 C9           	ret
  33+ A6F8
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 902  A6F8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ A6F8              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ A6F8              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ A6F8              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ A6F8              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ A6F8              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ A6F8              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ A6F8              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ A6F8              LL38:
   9+ A6F8              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ A6F8              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ A6F8              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ A6F8              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ A6F8              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ A6F8              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ A6F8              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ A6F8              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ A6F8              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ A6F8              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ A6F8              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ A6F8              ;	ret
  21+ A6F8              ; calculation table
  22+ A6F8              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ A6F8              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ A6F8              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ A6F8              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ A6F8              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ A6F8              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ A6F8              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ A6F8              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ A6F8              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ A6F8
  32+ A6F8              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ A6F8              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ A6F8              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ A6F8              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ A6F8
  37+ A6F8
  38+ A6F8              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ A6F8 21 9F 93     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ A6FB AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ A6FC FA 07 A7     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ A6FF 3A 9D 93     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ A702 21 9E 93     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ A705 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ A706 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ A707              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ A707 3A 9E 93     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ A70A 21 9D 93     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ A70D              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ A70D              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ A70D B7          >				or a
  51+ A70E 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ A70F 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ A711              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ A711              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ A711              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ A711 C9           	ret
  57+ A712              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ A712 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ A714 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ A716 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ A718 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ A719 3A 9F 93     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ A71C EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ A71E 32 9F 93     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ A721 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ A722                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ A722 B7          >				or a
  67+ A723 C9           	ret
  68+ A724              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ A724 32 9F 93         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ A727                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ A727 B7          >				or a
  71+ A728 C9               ret
  72+ A729              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ A729              ;--	push	bc
  74+ A729              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ A729              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ A729              ;--	sub		b
  77+ A729              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ A729              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ A729              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ A729              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ A729              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ A729              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ A729              ;--	ret
  84+ A729
  85+ A729              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ A729              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ A729              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ A729              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ A729              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ A729              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ A729              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ A729              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ A729              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ A729              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ A729              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ A729              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ A729              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ A729              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ A729              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ A729              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ A729              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ A729              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ A729              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ A729              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ A729              ;;;;	ret
 109+ A729              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ A729              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ A729              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ A729              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ A729              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ A729              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ A729              ;;;;	ret
 117+ A729              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ A729              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ A729              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ A729              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ A729              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ A729              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ A729              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ A729              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ A729              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ A729              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ A729              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ A729              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ A729              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ A729              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ A729              ;;;;	ret
 134+ A729              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ A729              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ A729              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ A729              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ A729              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ A729              ;;;;	ret
 141+ A729
 142+ A729
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 903  A729                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ A729              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ A729              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ A729              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ A729
   5+ A729
   6+ A729              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ A729 3A CC 92     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ A72C 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ A72D              moveship4breg:
  10+ A72D              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ A72D              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ A72D              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ A72D 3A 5B 93     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ A730 32 9D 93     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ A733 21 0D C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ A736 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ A737 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ A739 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ A73A 32 9E 93     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ A73D 23           		inc		hl
  21+ A73E 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ A73F 32 9F 93     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ A742 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ A743 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ A744 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ A745 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y

  28+ A749 23           		inc		hl
  29+ A74A 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y

  31+ A74D CD 6E A0     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ A750 23                   inc     hl
  33+ A751 23                   inc     hl

  35+ A753 2B                   dec     hl

  38+ A758 32 42 93             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ A75B 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ A75C 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ A75D 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ A75E 32 9E 93             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ A761 23                   inc     hl
  44+ A762 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y

  46+ A766 23                   inc     hl
  47+ A767 23                   inc     hl
  48+ A768 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ A769 CD 6E A0             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ A76C 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ A76D 2B                   dec     hl

  53+ A76F 3A CB 92             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ A772 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ A773 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ A774 32 42 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ A777 3A 4D 93             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ A77A 32 9D 93             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ A77D 23                   inc     hl
  60+ A77E 23                   inc     hl
  61+ A77F 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ A780 32 9E 93             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ A783 23                   inc     hl

  65+ A785 32 9F 93             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ A788 23                   inc     hl
  67+ A789 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ A78A 32 42 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ A78D 23                   inc     hl
  70+ A78E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ A78F EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ A791 CD 6E A0             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ A794 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ A795 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ A796 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ A797 3A CB 92             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ A79A 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ A79B 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ A79C 32 42 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ A79F 23                   inc     hl
  81+ A7A0 23                   inc     hl
  82+ A7A1 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y

  84+ A7A5 23                   inc     hl

  88+ A7AB 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ A7AC 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y

  91+ A7B0 23                   inc     hl

 908  A7B9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ A7B9              ;;;LL28:
   2+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ A7B9              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ A7B9              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ A7B9              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ A7B9              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ A7B9              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ A7B9              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ A7B9              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ A7B9              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ A7B9              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ A7B9              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ A7B9              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ A7B9              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ A7B9              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ A7B9              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ A7B9              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ A7B9              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ A7B9              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ A7B9              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ A7B9              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ A7B9              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ A7B9              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ A7B9              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ A7B9              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ A7B9              ;;;	ret
  34+ A7B9              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ A7B9              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ A7B9              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ A7B9              ;;;	ret
  39+ A7B9
  40+ A7B9              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ A7B9 59             ld    e,c
  42+ A7BA 67             ld    h,a
  43+ A7BB 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ A7BD              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ A7BD 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ A7BE B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ A7BF C8             ret z
  48+ A7C0 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ A7C3 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ A7C5              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ A7C5 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ A7C7 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ A7C8 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ A7CA C9             ret
  55+ A7CB
  56+ A7CB              HL_Div_C:
  57+ A7CB              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ A7CB              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ A7CB              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ A7CB 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ A7CD AF                   xor a
  62+ A7CE              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ A7CE 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ A7CF 17                   rla
  65+ A7D0 B9                   cp c
  66+ A7D1 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ A7D3 91                   sub c
  68+ A7D4 2C                   inc l
  69+ A7D5              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ A7D5 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ A7D7 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ A7D8 32 9E 93             ld  (varR),a
  73+ A7DB C9                   ret
  74+ A7DC
  75+ A7DC
  76+ A7DC
  77+ A7DC              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ A7DC              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ A7DC              BFRDIV:
  80+ A7DC F5           		push	af
  81+ A7DD 3A 9D 93     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ A7E0 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ A7E1 F1           		pop		af
  84+ A7E2 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ A7E4 CA FB A7     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ A7E7              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ A7E7 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ A7E9 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ A7EA              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ A7EA 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ A7EC AF           		xor a
  92+ A7ED              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ A7ED 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ A7EE 17           		rla
  95+ A7EF B9           		cp c
  96+ A7F0 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ A7F2 2C           		inc l
  98+ A7F3 91           		sub c
  99+ A7F4              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ A7F4 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ A7F6 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ A7F7 32 9E 93     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ A7FA C9           		ret
 104+ A7FB              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ A7FB 32 9E 93     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ A7FE C9           		ret
 107+ A7FF              ;	push	af
 108+ A7FF              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ A7FF              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ A7FF              ;	pop		af
 111+ A7FF              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ A7FF              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ A7FF              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ A7FF              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ A7FF              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ A7FF              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ A7FF              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ A7FF              ;	sla		a
 119+ A7FF              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ A7FF              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ A7FF              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ A7FF              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ A7FF              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ A7FF              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ A7FF              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ A7FF              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ A7FF              ;	scf
 128+ A7FF              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ A7FF              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ A7FF              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ A7FF              ;LL2:
 132+ A7FF              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ A7FF              ;LL2Good:
 134+ A7FF              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ A7FF              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ A7FF              ;	ret

 909  A7FF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ A7FF              RequAdivQ:
   2+ A7FF              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ A7FF              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ A7FF 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ A800 3A 9D 93     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ A803 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ A805 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ A807 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ A808 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ A80A AF               xor a
  11+ A80B              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ A80B CB 21            sla c
  13+ A80D 17               rla
  14+ A80E BA               cp d
  15+ A80F 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ A811 0C               inc c
  17+ A812 92               sub d
  18+ A813              LL64:
  19+ A813 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ A815 32 9C 93     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ A818 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ A819 32 9E 93     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ A81C C9               ret
  24+ A81D              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ A81D 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ A81F 32 9E 93     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ A822 32 9C 93     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ A825 C9           	ret
  29+ A826
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   1+ A826              asm_mult12:
   2+ A826              RSequQmulA:
   3+ A826              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ A826 CD CE A6     	call APequQmulA
   5+ A829 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ A82A 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ A82B 32 9F 93     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ A82E 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ A82F 32 9E 93     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ A832 08           	ex 	af,af'

   1++A834              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:
   2++A834                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX+1 ,XX15VecX
   2++A834 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
   2++A837 32 74 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a
   3++A83A                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, XX15VecY
   3++A83A 3A 23 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
   3++A83D 32 75 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecY),a
   4++A840                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ

   4++A843 32 76 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecZ),a

   6++A847
   7++A847              CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15:

   8++A84A 32 74 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a
   9++A84D                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1, XX15VecY
   9++A84D 3A 1D C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
   9++A850 32 75 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecY),a
  10++A853                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
