  32+ A8A6
  33+ A8A6              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ A8A6              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ A8A6              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ A8A6 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ A8A7 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ A8A8 32 9D 93     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ A8AB 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ A8AC EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ A8AE CD 6E A0     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ A8B1              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ A8B1              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ A8B1              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ A8B1 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ A8B2 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ A8B4 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ A8B5 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ A8B6 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ A8B8 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ A8BA              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ A8BA CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ A8BC              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ A8BC FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ A8BE DA CB A8    >                        jp		c,TIS1SkipSub
  54+ A8C1 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ A8C3 37           		scf
  56+ A8C4 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ A8C6 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ A8C8              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ A8C8 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ A8C9 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ A8CA C9           		ret
  62+ A8CB              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ A8CB B7           	or			a
  64+ A8CC CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ A8CE 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ A8D0 C3 C8 A8     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ A8D3
  68+ A8D3              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ A8D3              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ A8D3
  71+ A8D3
  72+ A8D3
  73+ A8D3
  74+ A8D3              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ A8D3 CD FF A9     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ A8D6 32 1F C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ A8D9 C3 0D A9     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ A8DC
  79+ A8DC              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ A8DC AF           		xor		a
  81+ A8DD 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ A8DE 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ A8E1 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ A8E3 CA D3 A8     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ A8E6 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ A8E9 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ A8EA 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ A8ED CD C5 A9     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ A8F0 32 1D C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ A8F3 C3 0D A9     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ A8F6              TIDY:
  92+ A8F6              ORTHOGALISE:
  93+ A8F6              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  94+ A8F6 CD 34 A8     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  95+ A8F9 CD 25 A4     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi
  96+ A8FC CD 6D A8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  97+ A8FF              .CheckNXSmall:
  98+ A8FF 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  99+ A902 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 100+ A904 CA DC A8     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 101+ A907              .RotXIsBig:
 102+ A907 CD 8B A9             call	CalcRoofvX
 103+ A90A 32 1B C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 104+ A90D              NormaliseRoofV:
 105+ A90D CD 47 A8     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 106+ A910 CD 25 A4     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 107+ A913              ;calc sidev x
 108+ A913 CD 80 A8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 109+ A916 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 110+ A919 32 9D 93     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 111+ A91C 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 112+ A91F CD 26 A8     		call	RSequQmulA
 113+ A922 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 114+ A925 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 115+ A926 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 116+ A929 CD A6 A8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 117+ A92C                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideXNoNeg
 117+ A92C FE 00       >				cp	0
 117+ A92E CA 33 A9    >				jp	z,NormSideXNoNeg
 118+ A931 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 119+ A933              NormSideXNoNeg:
 120+ A933 32 15 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 121+ A936              ;calc sidev y
 122+ A936 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 123+ A939 32 9D 93     		ld		(varQ),a
 124+ A93C 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 125+ A93F CD 26 A8     		call	RSequQmulA
 126+ A942 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 127+ A945 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 128+ A946 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 129+ A949 CD A6 A8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 130+ A94C                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideYNoNeg
 130+ A94C FE 00       >				cp	0
 130+ A94E CA 53 A9    >				jp	z,NormSideYNoNeg
 131+ A951 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 132+ A953              NormSideYNoNeg:
 133+ A953 32 23 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 134+ A956              ;calc sidev z
 135+ A956 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 136+ A959 32 9D 93     		ld		(varQ),a
 137+ A95C 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 138+ A95F CD 26 A8     		call	RSequQmulA
 139+ A962 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 140+ A965 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 141+ A966 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 142+ A969 CD A6 A8     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 143+ A96C                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideZNoNeg
 143+ A96C FE 00       >				cp	0
 143+ A96E CA 73 A9    >				jp	z,NormSideZNoNeg
 144+ A971 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 145+ A973              NormSideZNoNeg:
 146+ A973 32 17 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 147+ A976              .ClearLoBytes:
 148+ A976 21 20 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 149+ A979 06 09        		ld		b,9
 150+ A97B AF                   xor     a
 151+ A97C              .ClearLoLoop:
 152+ A97C 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 153+ A97D 23           		inc		hl
 154+ A97E 23           		inc		hl
 155+ A97F 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 156+ A981 CD 5A A8     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 157+ A984 CD 25 A4     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 158+ A987              ;calc sidev x
 159+ A987 CD 93 A8     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 160+ A98A
 161+ A98A C9           		ret
 162+ A98B
 163+ A98B
 164+ A98B
 165+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 166+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 167+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 168+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 169+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 170+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 171+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 172+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 173+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 174+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 175+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 176+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 177+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 178+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 179+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 180+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 181+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 182+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 183+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 184+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 185+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 186+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 187+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 188+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 189+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 190+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 191+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 192+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 193+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 194+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 195+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 196+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 197+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 198+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 199+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 200+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 201+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 202+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 203+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 204+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 205+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 206+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 207+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 208+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 209+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 210+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 211+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 212+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 213+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 214+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 215+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 216+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 217+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 218+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 219+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 220+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 221+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 222+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 223+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 224+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 225+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 226+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 227+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 228+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 229+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 230+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 231+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 232+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 233+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 234+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 235+ A98B              ;;;;;;;;
 236+ A98B
 237+ A98B
 238+ A98B              CalcRoofvX:
 239+ A98B              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 240+ A98B              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 240+ A98B 3A 25 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 240+ A98E 32 9D 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 241+ A991 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 242+ A994 CD 26 A8     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 243+ A997              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 243+ A997 3A 23 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 243+ A99A 32 9D 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 244+ A99D 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 245+ A9A0 CD 6E A0     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 246+ A9A3 7A           		ld		a,d
 247+ A9A4 E6 80        		and 	$80
 248+ A9A6 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 249+ A9A8              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 250+ A9A8 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 251+ A9AB 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 252+ A9AC E6 80        		and		$80
 253+ A9AE FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 254+ A9B0 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 255+ A9B2 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 256+ A9B3 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 257+ A9B5 42           		ld		b,d
 258+ A9B6 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 259+ A9B7 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 260+ A9B8 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 261+ A9BA CD A7 A2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 262+ A9BD FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 263+ A9BF EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 264+ A9C1 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 265+ A9C3 B0           		or		b
 266+ A9C4 C9           		ret
 267+ A9C5
 268+ A9C5
 269+ A9C5              CalcRoofvY:
 270+ A9C5              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 271+ A9C5              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 271+ A9C5 3A 25 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 271+ A9C8 32 9D 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 272+ A9CB 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 273+ A9CE CD 26 A8     		call	RSequQmulA
 274+ A9D1              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 274+ A9D1 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 274+ A9D4 32 9D 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 275+ A9D7 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 276+ A9DA CD 6E A0     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 277+ A9DD 7A           		ld		a,d
 278+ A9DE E6 80        		and 	$80
 279+ A9E0 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 280+ A9E2 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 281+ A9E5 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 282+ A9E6 E6 80        		and		$80
 283+ A9E8 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 284+ A9EA FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 285+ A9EC 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 286+ A9ED E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 287+ A9EF 42           		ld		b,d
 288+ A9F0 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 289+ A9F1 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 290+ A9F2 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 291+ A9F4 CD A7 A2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 292+ A9F7 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 293+ A9F9 EE 80        		xor		$80
 294+ A9FB E6 80        		and		$80
 295+ A9FD B0           		or		b
 296+ A9FE C9           		ret
 297+ A9FF
 298+ A9FF              CalcRoofvZ:
 299+ A9FF              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 300+ A9FF              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 300+ A9FF 3A 23 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 300+ AA02 32 9D 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 301+ AA05 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 302+ AA08 CD 26 A8     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 303+ AA0B              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 303+ AA0B 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 303+ AA0E 32 9D 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 304+ AA11 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 305+ AA14 CD 6E A0     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 306+ AA17 7A           		ld		a,d
 307+ AA18 E6 80        		and 	$80
 308+ AA1A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 309+ AA1C 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 310+ AA1F 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 311+ AA20 E6 80        		and		$80
 312+ AA22 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 313+ AA24 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 314+ AA26 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 315+ AA27 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 316+ AA29 42           		ld		b,d
 317+ AA2A 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 318+ AA2B 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 319+ AA2C 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 320+ AA2E CD A7 A2     		call	BC_Div_DE
 321+ AA31 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 322+ AA33 EE 80        		xor		$80
 323+ AA35 E6 80        		and		$80
 324+ AA37 B0           		or		b
 325+ AA38 C9           		ret
 326+ AA39
 327+ AA39
 328+ AA39
 329+ AA39              ;;ProcessSidev:
 330+ AA39              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 331+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 332+ AA39              ;;		push	bc
 333+ AA39              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 334+ AA39              ;;		pop		bc
 335+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 336+ AA39              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 337+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 338+ AA39              ;;		push	bc
 339+ AA39              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 340+ AA39              ;;		pop		bc
 341+ AA39              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 342+ AA39              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 343+ AA39              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 344+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 345+ AA39              ;;		push	bc
 346+ AA39              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 347+ AA39              ;;		pop		bc
 348+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 349+ AA39              ;;		ld		b,a
 350+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 351+ AA39              ;;		push	bc
 352+ AA39              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 353+ AA39              ;;		pop		bc
 354+ AA39              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 355+ AA39              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 356+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 357+ AA39              ;;		push	bc
 358+ AA39              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 359+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 360+ AA39              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 361+ AA39              ;;		pop		bc
 362+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 363+ AA39              ;;		ld		b,a
 364+ AA39              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 365+ AA39              ;;		push	bc
 366+ AA39              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 367+ AA39              ;;		pop		bc
 368+ AA39              ;;		xor		$80
 369+ AA39              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 370+ AA39              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 371+ AA39              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 372+ AA39              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 373+ AA39              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 374+ AA39
 375+ AA39
 376+ AA39
 377+ AA39
 378+ AA39
 379+ AA39
 380+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 381+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 382+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 383+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 384+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 385+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 386+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 387+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 388+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 389+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 390+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 391+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 392+ AA39              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 393+ AA39
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 914  AA39                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ AA39
   2+ AA39              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ AA39 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ AA3A D2 58 AA    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ AA3D 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ AA3F CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ AA41 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ AA43                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ AA43 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ AA44 DA 49 AA    >                        jp		c,.SkipSub
   7+ AA47 92                                   sub     d
   8+ AA48                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ AA48 B7          >				or a
   9+ AA49 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ AA4A CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ AA4C 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ AA4E 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ AA4F C9                                   ret
  14+ AA50 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ AA51 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ AA52 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ AA54 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ AA56 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ AA57 C9                                   ret
  20+ AA58 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ AA5A C9                                   ret
  22+ AA5B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 915  AA5B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ AA5B              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ AA5B              TIS1:
   3+ AA5B 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ AA5C 3A CB 92     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ AA5F 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ AA60 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ AA61              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ AA61 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ AA62 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ AA63 32 9D 93     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ AA66 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ AA67 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ AA69 CD 6E A0     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ AA6C              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ AA6C              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ AA6C              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ AA6C 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ AA6D E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ AA6F 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ AA70 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ AA71 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ AA73 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ AA75 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ AA76              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ AA76 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ AA78 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ AA7A 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ AA7C DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ AA7E              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ AA7E CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ AA80 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ AA82 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ AA83 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ AA84 C9           		ret
  35+ AA85
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

 924  AA85                  INCLUDE "./Drive/drive_access.asm"
# file opened: ./Drive/drive_access.asm
   1+ AA85              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ AA85              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ AA85              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ AA85              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ AA85              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ AA85              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ AA85
   8+ AA85              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ AA85              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ AA85              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ AA85
  12+ AA85 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  12+ AA89 DD E5
  13+ AA8B AF                                   xor	    a	; set drive. 0 is default
  14+ AA8C CF                                   rst	    $08
  15+ AA8D 89                                   db	    $89
  16+ AA8E 32 98 AA                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  17+ AA91 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  17+ AA95 C1 F1
  18+ AA97 C9                                   ret
  19+ AA98 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  20+ AA99
  21+ AA99              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  22+ AA99              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  23+ AA99              ;	In:		ix = filename
  24+ AA99              ;			b  = Open filemode
  25+ AA99              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  26+ AA99              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  27+ AA99 E5 DD E5     fOpen:	                push	hl,,ix
  28+ AA9C DD E5                                push	ix
  29+ AA9E 3A 98 AA                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  30+ AAA1 CF                                   rst	    $08
  31+ AAA2 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  32+ AAA3 DD E1 E1                             pop	    hl,,ix
  33+ AAA6 C9                                   ret
  34+ AAA7
  35+ AAA7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  36+ AAA7              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  37+ AAA7              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  38+ AAA7              ;			bc  = amount to read
  39+ AAA7              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  40+ AAA7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  41+ AAA7 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  42+ AAA8 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  43+ AAA9 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix   	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  44+ AAAC E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ AAAD CF                                   rst	    $08
  46+ AAAE 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  47+ AAAF E1                                   pop	    hl
  48+ AAB0 C9                                   ret
  49+ AAB1
  50+ AAB1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  51+ AAB1              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  52+ AAB1              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  53+ AAB1              ;			bc  = amount to read
  54+ AAB1              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  55+ AAB1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  56+ AAB1 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  57+ AAB2 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  58+ AAB3 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix
  59+ AAB6 E1                                   pop	    hl
  60+ AAB7 CF                                   rst	    $08
  61+ AAB8 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  62+ AAB9 E1                                   pop	    hl
  63+ AABA C9                                   ret
  64+ AABB
  65+ AABB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  66+ AABB              ;	Function:	Close open file
  67+ AABB              ;	In:		a  = handle
  68+ AABB              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  69+ AABB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  70+ AABB B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  71+ AABC C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  72+ AABD CF                                   rst	    $08
  73+ AABE 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  74+ AABF C9                                   ret
  75+ AAC0
  76+ AAC0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  77+ AAC0              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  78+ AAC0              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  79+ AAC0              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  80+ AAC0              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  81+ AAC0              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  82+ AAC0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  83+ AAC0 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  84+ AAC3 CF                                   rst	    $08
  85+ AAC4 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  86+ AAC5 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  87+ AAC8 C9                                   ret
  88+ AAC9
  89+ AAC9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  90+ AAC9              ; Init the file system
  91+ AAC9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ AAC9 CD 85 AA     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  93+ AACC C9                                   ret
  94+ AACD
  95+ AACD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  96+ AACD              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  97+ AACD              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
  98+ AACD              ;		ix = address to load to
  99+ AACD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 100+ AACD CD 85 AA     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 101+ AAD0 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 102+ AAD3                                      ; get file size
 103+ AAD3 4E                                   ld	    c,(hl)
 104+ AAD4 2C                                   inc	    l
 105+ AAD5 46                                   ld	    b,(hl)
 106+ AAD6 2C                                   inc	    l
 107+ AAD7 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 108+ AADA E5                                   push	hl				; get name into ix
 109+ AADB DD E1                                pop	    ix
 110+ AADD 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 111+ AADF CD 99 AA                             call    fOpen
 112+ AAE2 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 113+ AAE4 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 114+ AAE6 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 115+ AAE8 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 116+ AAEB F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 117+ AAEC CD A7 AA                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 118+ AAEF 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 119+ AAF1 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 120+ AAF2 CD BB AA                             call	fClose			; close file
 121+ AAF5 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 122+ AAF7 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 123+ AAFA C9                                   ret
 124+ AAFB              ;
 125+ AAFB              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 126+ AAFB              ;
 127+ AAFB DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 128+ AAFD C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 129+ AAFE
 130+ AAFE              .error_closing:
 131+ AAFE C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 132+ AAFF D1                                   pop	de
 133+ AB00 C1                                   pop	bc
 134+ AB01 C9                                   ret
 135+ AB02
 136+ AB02              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 137+ AB02              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 138+ AB02              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 139+ AB02              ;		ix = address to save from
 140+ AB02              ;		bc = size
 141+ AB02              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 142+ AB02 CD 85 AA     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 143+ AB05 C5 E5                                push	bc,,hl   			; store size& save address
 144+ AB07 E5                                   push	hl		        	; get name into ix
 145+ AB08 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 146+ AB0A 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 147+ AB0C CD 99 AA                             call    fOpen
 148+ AB0F 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 149+ AB11 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 150+ AB13 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 151+ AB15 DD E1                                pop	    ix			        ; get save address back
 152+ AB17 C1                                   pop	    bc			        ; get size back
 153+ AB18 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 154+ AB19 CD B1 AA                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 155+ AB1C 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 156+ AB1E F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 157+ AB1F CD BB AA                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 158+ AB22 C9           .error:                 ret
 159+ AB23              ;
 160+ AB23              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 161+ AB23              ;
 162+ AB23 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 163+ AB25 C1                                   pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 164+ AB26 C9                                   ret
 165+ AB27
# file closed: ./Drive/drive_access.asm

  18+ ABD4
  19+ ABD4              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ ABD4              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ ABD4              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ ABD4 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ ABD5 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ ABD6 23           	inc			hl
  25+ ABD7 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ ABD8 23           	inc			hl
  27+ ABD9 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ ABDA 23           	inc			hl
  29+ ABDB 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ ABDC 23           	inc			hl
  31+ ABDD E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ ABDE EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ ABDF 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ ABE1                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ ABE1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ ABE5 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ ABE8 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ ABE9 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ ABEA 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ ABEC C9           	ret
  40+ ABED
  41+ ABED
  42+ ABED              print_boiler_text:
  43+ ABED              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ ABED              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ ABED C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ ABEE 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ ABEF 23           	inc			hl
  48+ ABF0 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ ABF1 23           	inc			hl
  50+ ABF2 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ ABF3 23           	inc			hl
  52+ ABF4 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ ABF5 23           	inc			hl
  54+ ABF6 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ ABF7 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ ABF8 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ ABFA C5           	push		bc
  58+ ABFB D1           	pop			de
  59+ ABFC CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ ABFF E1           	pop			hl
  61+ AC00 C1           	pop			bc
  62+ AC01 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ AC03 C9           	ret

   1++AC04
   2++AC04
   3++AC04 3A BD 96     	ld		a,(Fuel)
   4++AC07 11 B2 AB     	ld		de,txt_fuel_level
   5++AC0A 0E 9C        	ld	c, -100
   6++AC0C CD 16 AC     	call	.Num1
   7++AC0F 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
   8++AC11 CD 16 AC     	call	.Num1
   9++AC14 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++AC16              .Num1:
  11++AC16 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++AC18              .Num2:
  13++AC18 04           	inc		b
  14++AC19 81           	add		a,c
  15++AC1A 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++AC1C 91           	sub 	c
  17++AC1D C5           	push	bc
  18++AC1E F5           	push	af
  19++AC1F 79           	ld		a,c
  20++AC20 FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++AC22 CC 2B AC     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++AC25 78           	ld		a,b
  23++AC26 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++AC27 13           	inc		de
  25++AC28 F1           	pop		af
  26++AC29 C1           	pop		bc
  27++AC2A C9           	ret
  28++AC2B              .InsertDot:
  29++AC2B 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++AC2D 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++AC2E 13           	inc		de
  32++AC2F C9           	ret

  67+ AC30 2A B9 96     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ AC33 EB                                   ex      de,hl

  71+ AC3C CD B7 A5                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ AC3F FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ AC42 32 CF AB                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ AC45 21 C4 AB     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ AC48 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ AC49 FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ AC4B C8                                   ret		z

  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:

  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre

  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a

 162+ C1F3 CD E8 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 163+ C1F6 DD 2A 9B 94                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 164+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 165+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 166+ C201 CD B7 A5                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 167+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 168+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 169+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 170+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 171+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 172+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 173+ C20F CD EB A3                             call    compare16HLDE
 174+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 175+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 176+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 177+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 178+ C219 CD EB A3                             call    compare16HLDE
 179+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 180+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 181+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 182+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 183+ C223 CD EB A3                             call    compare16HLDE
 184+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 185+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 186+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 187+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 188+ C22D
 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c,.NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c,.NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 236+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 237+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 238+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 239+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 240+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 241+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 242+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 243+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 244+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 245+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 246+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 247+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 248+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 249+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 250+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 251+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 252+ C2B3
 253+ C2B3 CD 5F 97     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 254+ C2B6 3A 5B 94                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 255+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 255+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 256+ C2BC CD 81 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 257+ C2BF 21 5D 9F                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 258+ C2C2 CD B8 9E                             call	CapitaliseString
 259+ C2C5 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 260+ C2C8 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 261+ C2CA 47                                   ld		b,a					    ; b = effective pixel row
 262+ C2CB 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 263+ C2CE C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 264+ C2D0 4F                                   ld		c,a                     ; c = effective pixel col
 265+ C2D1 1E 00        .GetStringName:         ld      e,0
 266+ C2D3 21 5D 9F                             ld      hl,name_expanded
 267+ C2D6 7E           .getStringLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 268+ C2D7 23                                   inc     hl
 269+ C2D8 1C                                   inc     e
 270+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work
 271+ C2DB 20 F9                                jr      nz,.getStringLoop
 272+ C2DD 16 08                                ld      d,8
 273+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc
 274+ C2E0 CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; first attemps
 275+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 276+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 277+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 278+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 279+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 280+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 281+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 282+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 283+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 284+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 285+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 286+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b
 287+ C2F6 D6 10                                sub     16
 288+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 289+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 290+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 291+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 292+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 293+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz
 294+ C301 1E FF        .OKToPrint:             ld		e,$FF
 295+ C303 21 5D 9F                             ld		hl,name_expanded
 296+ C306                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 296+ C306 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 297+ C30A CD CF E1                             call	l2_print_7at
 298+ C30D C9                                   ret
 299+ C30E
 300+ C30E              name_if_possible:
 301+ C30E 3A 18 C0     SRCpixelRowToRefRow:    ld		a,(local_name_row)
 302+ C311 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 303+ C313 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 304+ C314 CB 3F                                srl		a
 305+ C316 CB 3F                                srl		a
 306+ C318 CB 3F                                srl		a					; divide by 8 to get character row
 307+ C31A                                  ;	sub		2					; don;t write over header TODO tweaks
 308+ C31A 21 63 93                             ld		hl,IndexedWork
 309+ C31D ED 31                                add		hl,a
 310+ C31F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 311+ C320 FE 00                                cp		0
 312+ C322 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryAbove		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 313+ C324 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 314+ C326 18 12                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 315+ C328 2B           SRCtryAbove:            dec		hl
 316+ C329 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 317+ C32A FE 00                                cp		0
 318+ C32C 20 04                                jr		nz, SRCtryBelow		; if its not empty don't print *(need to test +-1 row TODO)
 319+ C32E 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 320+ C330 18 08                                jr		SRCFoundRow
 321+ C332 23           SRCtryBelow:            inc		hl
 322+ C333 23                                   inc		hl
 323+ C334 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 324+ C335 FE 00                                cp		0
 325+ C337 C8                                   ret		z
 326+ C338 36 01                                ld		(hl),1				; flag as in use
 327+ C33A CD 5F 97     SRCFoundRow:            call	copy_system_to_working
 328+ C33D 3A 5B 94     SRCSmallSizeName:       ld      a,(Galaxy)
 329+ C340                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 329+ C340 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 330+ C343 CD 81 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
 331+ C346 21 5D 9F     SRCCapitaliseName:      ld		hl,name_expanded
 332+ C349 CD B8 9E                             call	CapitaliseString
 333+ C34C 21 5D 9F     SRCPrintName:           ld		hl, name_expanded
 334+ C34F 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 335+ C352 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 336+ C354 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 337+ C355 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 338+ C358 C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 339+ C35A 4F                                   ld		c,a
 340+ C35B 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 341+ C35D                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 341+ C35D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 342+ C361 CD CF E1                             call	l2_print_7at
 343+ C364 C9                                   ret

 345+ C365 AF           plot_local_stars:       xor		a
 346+ C366 32 A2 93                             ld		(XSAV),a
 347+ C369 DD 21 16 E0                          ld      ix,galaxy_data
 348+ C36D 32 C1 C0                             ld      (src_buffer_size),a
 349+ C370 21 41 C0     SRCClearNameList:       ld		hl,src_printed_text
 350+ C373 11 80 00                             ld		de,src_fill_buffer_size
 351+ C376 CD 99 8F                             call	memfill_dma
 351+ C379
 352+ C379 AF           SRCCounterLoop:         xor		a
 353+ C37A 3A 5B 94                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 354+ C37D                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA

 355+ C380 DD E5                                push    ix
 356+ C382 DD E5                                push    ix

 358+ C385 11 89 93                             ld      de,SystemSeed
 359+ C388 CD 32 97                             call    copy_seed
 360+ C38B 3A 8A 93                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 361+ C38E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 362+ C38F 3A 53 94     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 363+ C392 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 364+ C393 79                                   ld		a,c
 365+ C394 90                                   sub		b
 366+ C395 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 367+ C397 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedy
 368+ C399 ED 44        SRCnegativedy:          neg
 369+ C39B FE 26        SRCpositivedy:          cp		local_max_range_y
 370+ C39D 30 48                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 371+ C39F 3A 8C 93     SRCcalcLocaldx:         ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 372+ C3A2 4F                                   ld		c,a
 373+ C3A3 3A 52 94                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 374+ C3A6 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 375+ C3A7 79                                   ld		a,c
 376+ C3A8 90                                   sub		b
 377+ C3A9 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 378+ C3AB 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedx
 379+ C3AD ED 44        SRCnegativedx:          neg
 380+ C3AF FE 14        SRCpositivedx:          cp		local_max_range_x
 381+ C3B1 30 34                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 382+ C3B3 3A 8A 93     SRCOKToPlot             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
 383+ C3B6 21 53 94                             ld		hl,PresentSystemY
 384+ C3B9 96                                   sub		(hl)
 385+ C3BA CB 27                                sla		a								; * 2
 386+ C3BC C6 60                                add		src_y_centre
 387+ C3BE 32 18 C0                             ld		(local_name_row),a
 388+ C3C1 47                                   ld		b,a
 389+ C3C2 3A 8C 93                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)

 391+ C3C8 96                                   sub		(hl)

  24+ C08E              GCM_print_boiler_text:
  25+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  26+ C0A9              GCM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair:
  27+ C0A9 ED 4B 52 94  	ld		bc,(PresentSystemX)				; bc = present system
  28+ C0AD              .OnGalacticChart:
  29+ C0AD CB 38        	srl		b								; but row is row / 2
  30+ C0AF C5           	push  	bc
  31+ C0B0              	MMUSelectSpriteBank
  31+ C0B0 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
  32+ C0B4 CD 65 E0     	call	sprite_galactic_cursor
  33+ C0B7 C1           	pop		bc
  34+ C0B8 78           	ld		a,b
  35+ C0B9 C6 18        	add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset
  36+ C0BB 47           	ld		b,a
  37+ C0BC 3A BD 96     	ld		a,(Fuel)
  38+ C0BF CB 3F        	srl		a
  39+ C0C1 CB 3F        	srl		a								; divide range of fuel by 4 for galactic chart
  40+ C0C3 57           	ld		d,a
  41+ C0C4 1E FF        	ld		e,$FF
  42+ C0C6              	MMUSelectLayer2
  42+ C0C6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  43+ C0CA CD 5A E7     	call	l2_draw_circle
  44+ C0CD C9           	ret

  46+ C0CE

  49+ C0D2              .OnGalacticChart:
  50+ C0D2 CB 38        	srl		b								; but row is row / 2
  51+ C0D4              	MMUSelectSpriteBank
  51+ C0D4 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE

  55+ C0DC
  56+ C0DC              plot_gc_stars:
  57+ C0DC AF           	xor		a
  58+ C0DD 32 A2 93     	ld		(XSAV),a
  59+ C0E0 DD 21 16 E0      ld      ix,galaxy_data
  60+ C0E4              .CounterLoop:
  61+ C0E4 3A 5B 94         ld      a,(Galaxy)
  62+ C0E7                  MMUSelectGalaxyA
  62+ C0E7 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
  63+ C0EA DD E5            push    ix
  64+ C0EC E1               pop     hl
  65+ C0ED 11 89 93         ld      de,SystemSeed
  66+ C0F0 CD 32 97     	call    copy_seed
  67+ C0F3 3A 8C 93     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed w1_h is Xcoord of star
  68+ C0F6 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = X Coord
  69+ C0F7 3A 8A 93     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  70+ C0FA CB 3F        	srl		a								; Ycoord /2
  71+ C0FC C6 18        	add		a,galactic_chart_y_offset		; add offset to Y coord of star
  72+ C0FE 47           	ld		b,a								; b = row
  73+ C0FF C5           	push	bc
  74+ C100 3E D8        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour
  75+ C102                  MMUSelectLayer2
  75+ C102 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  76+ C106 CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  77+ C109 C1           	pop		bc
  78+ C10A 3A 8D 93     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  79+ C10D F6 50        	or		$50								; minimum distance away
  80+ C10F FE 90        	cp		$90
  81+ C111 30 0A        	jr		nc,.NoSecondPixel
  82+ C113              .SecondPixel:
  83+ C113 0C           	inc		c
  84+ C114 3E 6C        	ld		a,galactic_star_colour2
  85+ C116                  MMUSelectLayer2
  85+ C116 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  86+ C11A CD FF E0     	call	l2_plot_pixel
  87+ C11D              .NoSecondPixel:
  88+ C11D DD E5            push    ix
  89+ C11F E1               pop     hl
  90+ C120 ED 34 08 00      add     hl,8
  91+ C124 E5               push    hl
  92+ C125 DD E1            pop     ix
  93+ C127 3A A2 93     	ld		a,(XSAV)
  94+ C12A 3D           	dec		a
  95+ C12B FE 00        	cp		0
  96+ C12D C8           	ret		z
  97+ C12E 32 A2 93     	ld		(XSAV),a
  98+ C131 18 B1        	jr		.CounterLoop

 162+ C218              gc_display_find_string:
 163+ C218 11 BC C1         ld      de,gcInputText

 166+ C221 ED A0            ldi                             ; Copy cursor to local
 167+ C223 3A 8C 91         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 168+ C226 3C               inc     a
 169+ C227 47               ld      b,a
 170+ C228 3E 14            ld      a,20
 171+ C22A 90               sub     b
 172+ C22B 47               ld      b,a

 186+ C242              blink_cursor:

 205+ C262 3A B8 C1     loop_gc_menu:           ld      a,(gcFindInputMode)
 206+ C265 FE 00                                cp      0
 207+ C267 20 1C                                jr      nz,AlreadyInInputMode
 208+ C269 3E 4E        .StartFindCheck:        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 209+ C26B CD 1F 91                             call    is_key_pressed
 210+ C26E C0                                   ret     nz

 212+ C272 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF

 214+ C277 3E 10                                ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 215+ C279 32 B9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a                       ; Set up Blink

 219+ C284 C9                                   ret
 220+ C285              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 221+ C285 3A DB C1     AlreadyInInputMode:     ld      a,(gcInputDelay)                    ; keyboard next press delay

 223+ C28A 20 17                                jr      nz,.blinkCursor                     ; so re just go to blink cursor routine if not permitted

 230+ C299 32 DB C1                             ld     (gcInputDelay),a

 241+ C2B5 C9                                   ret

  43+ C070              INM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C070 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C071 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C072 23           	inc			hl
   7++C073 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C074 23           	inc			hl
   9++C075 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C076 23           	inc			hl
  11++C077 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C078 23           	inc			hl
  13++C079 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C07A EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C07B 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C07D C5           	push		bc
  17++C07E D1           	pop			de
  18++C07F                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C083 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C086 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C087 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C088 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C08A C9           	ret
  24++C08B

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C2C5 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C2C6 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C2C7 23           	inc			hl
   7++C2C8 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C2C9 23           	inc			hl
   9++C2CA 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C2CB 23           	inc			hl
  11++C2CC 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C2CD 23           	inc			hl
  13++C2CE E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C2CF EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C2D0 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C2D2 C5           	push		bc
  17++C2D3 D1           	pop			de
  18++C2D4                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C2D8 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C2DB E1           	pop			hl
  21++C2DC C1           	pop			bc
  22++C2DD 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C2DF C9           	ret
  24++C2E0

 303+ C4E3              ; HL = value to add on
 304+ C4E3              ; de = Unit of Measure
 305+ C4E3 7E           SDAddUoMtoHL:           ld      a,(hl)

 313+ C4F0
 314+ C4F0              ; works on HL already being at end
 315+ C4F0              ; de = Unit of Measure
 316+ C4F0 23           SDTackOnUOMtoHL:        inc     hl
 317+ C4F1 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 318+ C4F2 CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop

 203+ C213              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 204+ C213              MPM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C213
   2++C213              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C213              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C213 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C214 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C215 23           	inc			hl
   7++C216 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C217 23           	inc			hl
   9++C218 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C219 23           	inc			hl
  11++C21A 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C21B 23           	inc			hl
  13++C21C E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C21D EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C21E 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C220 C5           	push		bc
  17++C221 D1           	pop			de
  18++C222                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C222 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C226 CD 80 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C229 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C22A C1           	pop			bc
  22++C22B 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C22D C9           	ret
  24++C22E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 264+ C2B1 57                                   ld		d,a
 265+ C2B2 ED 30                                mul

 350+ C3C5 22 41 C0                             ld		(market_cursor),hl
 351+ C3C8 F5           MarketLoop:	            push	af

 357+ C3D2 AF           .InitialHighlight:      xor     a
 358+ C3D3 32 74 C0                             ld      (mkt_selected_row),a        ; assume on row zero

 360+ C3D9 21 64 C0     .DisCargo:              ld      hl,mkt_hold_level
 361+ C3DC 11 10 A8                             ld      de,$A810

 371+ C3FA
 372+ C3FA
 373+ C3FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 374+ C3FA              ; Handles all the input whilst in the market menu
 375+ C3FA 3E 4A        loop_market_menu:       ld      a,c_Pressed_CursorUp
 376+ C3FC CD 1F 91                             call    is_key_pressed
 377+ C3FF CC 1B C4                             call    z,mkt_UpPressed
 378+ C402 3E 4C                                ld      a,c_Pressed_CursorDown
 379+ C404 CD 1F 91                             call    is_key_pressed
 380+ C407 CC 2C C4                             call    z,mkt_DownPressed
 381+ C40A 3E 08                                ld      a,c_Pressed_RollLeft
 382+ C40C CD 1F 91                             call    is_key_pressed
 383+ C40F CC 3D C4                             call    z,mkt_LeftPressed
 384+ C412 3E 0A                                ld      a,c_Pressed_RollRight
 385+ C414 CD 1F 91                             call    is_key_pressed
 386+ C417 CC 80 C4                             call    z,mkt_RightPressed
 387+ C41A C9                                   ret
 388+ C41B
 389+ C41B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 390+ C41B 3A 74 C0     mkt_UpPressed:          ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 391+ C41E FE 00                                cp      0
 392+ C420 C8                                   ret     z
 393+ C421 CD C3 C0                             call    mkt_lowlight_row
 394+ C424 21 74 C0                             ld      hl,mkt_selected_row
 395+ C427 35                                   dec     (hl)
 396+ C428 CD B3 C0                             call    mkt_highlight_row
 397+ C42B C9                                   ret
 398+ C42C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 399+ C42C 3A 74 C0     mkt_DownPressed:        ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 400+ C42F FE 10                                cp      16
 401+ C431 C8                                   ret     z
 402+ C432 CD C3 C0                             call    mkt_lowlight_row
 403+ C435 21 74 C0                             ld      hl,mkt_selected_row
 404+ C438 34                                   inc     (hl)
 405+ C439 CD B3 C0                             call    mkt_highlight_row
 406+ C43C C9                                   ret
 407+ C43D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ C43D 3A 74 C0     mkt_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 409+ C440 21 C4 96                             ld      hl,CargoTonnes
 410+ C443 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 411+ C445 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 412+ C446 FE 00                                cp      0
 413+ C448 C8                                   ret     z
 414+ C449 35                                   dec     (hl)
 415+ C44A DD 21 00 E0                          ld      ix,StockFood
 416+ C44E 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 417+ C451 16 08                                ld      d,8
 418+ C453 5F                                   ld      e,a
 419+ C454 ED 30                                mul
 420+ C456 DD 19                                add     ix,de
 421+ C458                                      MMUSelectStockTable
 421+ C458 ED 91 57 37 >                     nextreg StockTableMMU,     BankStockTable
 422+ C45C DD 34 01                             inc     (ix+1)
 423+ C45F DD 7E 07                             ld      a,(ix+7)
 424+ C462 FE 30                                cp      48
 425+ C464 20 04                                jr      nz,.UnderATonne
 426+ C466 21 C3 96                             ld      hl,CargoRunningLoad
 427+ C469 35                                   dec     (hl)            ; We need to cosider UoM
 428+ C46A DD 7E 02     .UnderATonne:           ld      a,(ix+2)
 429+ C46D 16 00                                ld      d,0
 430+ C46F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 431+ C470 CD 07 A0                             call    addDEtoCash
 432+ C473                                      ; DO ADD CASH
 433+ C473 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 434+ C476 CD 8B C2                             call    PrintMarketItem
 435+ C479 CD 69 C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCargo
 436+ C47C CD 7A C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCash
 437+ C47F C9                                   ret
 438+ C480              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 439+ C480              mkt_RightPressed:       MMUSelectStockTable
 439+ C480 ED 91 57 37 >                     nextreg StockTableMMU,     BankStockTable
 440+ C484 DD 21 00 E0                          ld      ix,StockFood
 441+ C488 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 442+ C48B 16 08                                ld      d,8
 443+ C48D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 444+ C48E ED 30                                mul
 445+ C490 DD 19                                add     ix,de
 446+ C492 4F                                   ld      c,a
 447+ C493 DD 7E 01                             ld      a,(ix+1)
 448+ C496 FE 00                                cp      0
 449+ C498 C8                                   ret     z
 450+ C499 DD 7E 07     .CheckUoM:              ld      a,(ix+7)
 451+ C49C FE 30                                cp      48
 452+ C49E 28 0F                                jr      z,.CheckCargo                       ; cargo is in tonnes
 453+ C4A0 3A 74 C0     .NotTonnage:            ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 454+ C4A3 21 C4 96                             ld      hl,CargoTonnes
 455+ C4A6 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 456+ C4A8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 457+ C4A9 FE C8                                cp      200
 458+ C4AB C8                                   ret     z                                   ; else its a 200 UoM limit
 459+ C4AC C3 B5 C4                             jp      .CheckCash
 460+ C4AF 2A C2 96     .CheckCargo:            ld      hl,(CargoBaySize)                   ; = h = runningload l = cargo bay size
 461+ C4B2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 462+ C4B3 BD                                   cp      l
 463+ C4B4 C8                                   ret     z                                   ; return if we have already maxed out
 464+ C4B5 2A BB 96     .CheckCash:             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
 465+ C4B8 7C                                   ld      a,h
 466+ C4B9 B5                                   or      l
 467+ C4BA 20 0F                                jr      nz,.MoreThanRequired
 468+ C4BC 2A B9 96                             ld      hl,(Cash)
 469+ C4BF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 470+ C4C0 FE 00                                cp      0
 471+ C4C2 20 07                                jr      nz,.MoreThanRequired
 472+ C4C4 DD 7E 02                             ld      a,(ix+2)
 473+ C4C7 BD                                   cp      l
 474+ C4C8 30 01                                jr      nc,.MoreThanRequired
 475+ C4CA C9                                   ret                         ; Insufficient Funds
 476+ C4CB 19           .MoreThanRequired:      add     hl,de
 477+ C4CC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 478+ C4CD B3                                   or      e
 479+ C4CE                                      ; check cash can we buy, and cargo capacity
 480+ C4CE DD 35 01                             dec     (ix+1)
 481+ C4D1 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 482+ C4D4 21 C4 96                             ld      hl,CargoTonnes
 483+ C4D7 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 484+ C4D9 34                                   inc     (hl)
 485+ C4DA DD 7E 07                             ld      a,(ix+7)
 486+ C4DD 47                                   ld      b,a
 487+ C4DE FE 30                                cp      48
 488+ C4E0 20 05                                jr      nz,.UnderOneTonne
 489+ C4E2 78                                   ld      a,b
 490+ C4E3 21 C3 96                             ld      hl,CargoRunningLoad
 491+ C4E6 34                                   inc     (hl)
 492+ C4E7 DD 7E 02     .UnderOneTonne:         ld      a,(ix+2)
 493+ C4EA 16 00                                ld      d,0
 494+ C4EC 5F                                   ld      e,a
 495+ C4ED CD 1A A0                             call    subDEfromCash
 496+ C4F0 3A 74 C0                             ld      a,(mkt_selected_row)
 497+ C4F3 CD 8B C2                             call    PrintMarketItem
 498+ C4F6 CD 69 C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCargo
 499+ C4F9 CD 7A C2                             call    MKT_DisplayCash
 500+ C4FC C9                                   ret
# file closed: ./Menus/market_prices_menu.asm
